<EFX_EXHIBIT_10>
<A NAME="FIS_EXHIBIT_10"></A>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 0PT">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: RIGHT">
	Exhibit 10.47
</DIV>
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 0PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.4PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 12PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; MARGIN-LEFT: 9PT; MARGIN-TOP: 1.5PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.1PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 9.5PT">
	EXCLUSIVE LICENSE AGREEMENT
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.5PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 7.35PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.1PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 2.3PT; TEXT-INDENT: 34.55PT">
	THIS LICENSE AGREEMENT (the "Agreement") is entered into by and between THE JOHNS HOPKINS UNIVERSITY, a Maryland corporation having an address at 3400 N. Charles Street, Baltimore, Maryland, 21218-2695 ("JHU") and PROGENICS PHARMACEUTICALS, INC. ("LICENSEE"), a Delaware corporation having an address at 777
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 7.6PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0.1PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.2PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 2.6PT">
	Old Saw Mill River Road, Tarrytown, NY 10591 and is effective on the 30th day of July, 2015 ("EFFECTIVE DATE"), but if none stated, then on the date of the last signature affixed.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.8PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; MARGIN-LEFT: 9PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.1PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 9.5PT; TEXT-INDENT: 4.5PT">
	RECITALS
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.25PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 6.9PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.35PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 3.3PT; TEXT-INDENT: 34.3PT">
	A valuable invention or inventions listed and described in Exhibit A ("INVENTION") was/were developed during the course of research conducted by the inventors listed on Exhibit A (all hereinafter, "INVENTORS").&#160; JHU has acquired through assignment all rights, title and interest of said INVENTORS in said valuable INVENTION and the related PATENT RIGHTS. JHU desires that the invention be perfected and marketed as soon as possible so that resulting products may be available for public use and benefit.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.45PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 6.9PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.35PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 3.5PT; TEXT-INDENT: 34.3PT">
	JHU and LICENSEE understand and accept that the availability of LICENSED PRODUCTS and LICENSED SERVICES at affordable prices to poor segments of the world's populations is an important objective of the parties.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.4PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 6.65PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.35PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 4.05PT; TEXT-INDENT: 34.3PT">
	LICENSEE desires to obtain certain rights in such inventions as herein provided, and to commercially develop, manufacture, use and distribute products and processes based upon or embodying said valuable inventions.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.4PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 6.65PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.5PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 4.25PT; TEXT-INDENT: 34.3PT">
	JHU is willing to grant such a license to LICENSEE, under the terms and conditions set forth in this AGREEMENT.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.05PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 6.4PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.5PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 4.4PT; TEXT-INDENT: 34.55PT">
	In consideration of the mutual covenants herein contained and other good and valuable consideration, receipt of which is hereby acknowledged, the parties agree as follows:
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.75PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN-LEFT: 6.9PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.1PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	1.
</FONT>
<FONT ID="TRGRRTFTOHTMLTAB" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 5.52PT">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	DEFINITIONS
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 5.9PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.35PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 4.5PT; TEXT-INDENT: 34.8PT">
	All references to particular Exhibits, Articles or Paragraphs shall mean the Exhibits to, and Paragraphs and Articles of, this Agreement, unless otherwise specified.&#160; Any reference herein to any defined term shall include both the singular and the plural, whether or not both forms are included in the reference. For the purposes of this Agreement and the Exhibits hereto, the following words and phrases shall have the following meanings:
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.4PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 41.7PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.1PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF">
	1.1
</FONT>
<FONT ID="TRGRRTFTOHTMLTAB" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 5.55PT">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"ASIA COUNTRY"
</FONT>
	shall mean each of China, Japan, India and Hong Kong.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.5PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 5.7PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.4PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 4.75PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT">
	1.2&#160; &#160;&#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"AFFILIATED COMPANY"
</FONT>
	shall&#160; mean&#160;&#160; any&#160;&#160; corporation,&#160;&#160; company, partnership, joint venture or other entity, which controls, is controlled by or is under common control with LICENSEE. For purposes of this Paragraph control shall mean the direct or indirect ownership of at least fifty percent (50%) of the outstanding voting stock or other ownership interest therein.
</DIV>
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGEBREAKAREA" STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10PT; CLEAR: BOTH; MARGIN-TOP: 10PT">
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGENUMBERAREA" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 8PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	1
</DIV>
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGEBREAK" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: ALWAYS; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; MARGIN-LEFT: 9PT; TEXT-INDENT: -9PT">
<HR STYLE="BORDER-LEFT-WIDTH: 0PX; HEIGHT: 2PX; BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: 0PX; BORDER-BOTTOM-WIDTH: 0PX; COLOR: #000000; CLEAR: BOTH; MARGIN: 4PX 0PX; BORDER-TOP-WIDTH: 0PX; WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000" NOSHADE="NOSHADE">
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage112"></A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 0PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 0PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.85PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 13PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 13PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 7.1PT; MARGIN-TOP: 1.5PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.35PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 2.75PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36.5PT">
	1.3&#160; &#160;&#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"EFFECTIVE DATE"
</FONT>
	of this License Agreement shall mean the date stated above at the beginning of this Agreement, but if none is stated, then it shall mean the last date that this Agreement was signed by JHU and LICENSEE.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.4PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 7.1PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.35PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 2.65PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36.25PT">
	1.4&#160; &#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"EXCLUSIVE LICENSE"
</FONT>
	means that, subject to specific limitations in this Agreement, and subject to rights retained by the United States Government, if any, JHU grants to LICENSEE all of JHU's rights under the LICENSED PATENT(S) in the LICENSED FIELD of USE in the LICENSED TERRITORY.&#160; Exclusive refers to PATENT RIGHTS only. KNOW HOW, data and other materials licensed are provided on a non-exclusive basis only.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.4PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 6.9PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.35PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 2.75PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36.25PT">
	1.5&#160; &#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"FIRST COMMERCIAL SALE"
</FONT>
	shall mean the first transfer by a LICENSEE, AFFILIATED COMPANY or SUBLICENSEE of a LICENSED PRODUCT or LICENSED SERVICE for value, but shall not include a transfer of materials for the purpose of use in a clinical trial, where the consideration received is intended to cover the manufacturing cost of the materials, or "compassionate use" or similar transfers where the consideration received is intended to cover the manufacturing cost of the materials.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.2PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 6.65PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.4PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 4.1PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36.25PT">
	1.6&#160; &#160;&#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"JHU REF. NUMBER"
</FONT>
	shall mean the JHU Technology Transfer Office case number or numbers, shown on Exhibit A, to which the TECHNOLOGY licensed hereunder pertains.
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF">
	It
</FONT>
	is used for JHU reference only. The TECHNOLOGY licensed herein is described in this Agreement, and may not include all the technology that may be a part of the JHU reference number.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.1PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 6.4PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.35PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 4.1PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36.5PT">
	1.6&#160; &#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"JHU INDEMNITEES"
</FONT>
	means JHU, The Johns Hopkins Hospital, The Johns Hopkins Health System Corporation, and their affiliated entities, their present and former trustees, officers, INVENTORS, agents, faculty, employees and students.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.4PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 6.15PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.1PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 3.95PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36.25PT">
	1.7&#160; &#160;&#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"KNOW HOW"
</FONT>
	licensed herein means information, including but not limited to data, test results, research methodology and published matter created by INVENTORS, listed in Exhibit E, and supplied by JHU to the LICENSEE on or before or after the EFFECTIVE DATE of this Agreement. Provided, however, that although JHU may supply additional KNOW HOW after the EFFECTIVE DATE, JHU shall have no obligation to do so unless specifically and clearly stated in this Agreement. In the event that additional KNOW HOW is added, the parties shall amend Exhibit E accordingly.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.45PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 42.15PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.1PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF">
	1.8
</FONT>
<FONT ID="TRGRRTFTOHTMLTAB" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 5.64PT">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"LICENSED FIELD of USE"
</FONT>
	shall be as described on EXHIBIT A.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.75PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 5.7PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.1PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 4.6PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36.5PT">
	1.9&#160; &#160;&#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"LICENSED PATENT"
</FONT>
	means the JHU Patent Applications and issued Patents listed on Exhibit A, and any foreign patent application corresponding thereto, and any divisional, continuation, or reexamination application, and each patent that issues or reissues from any of these patent applications and all re-examinations or extensions thereof. "LICENSED PATENT" includes any continuation-in-part (CIP) patent application or patent only to the extent that the practice of the claims of such continuation-in-part would infringe claims of the patents or patent applications in the Field and the Territory licensed hereunder.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.45PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 5.7PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.35PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.1PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36.25PT">
	1.10
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"LICENSED PRODUCT"
</FONT>
	shall mean any process or method, material, compositions, precursors, drug, or other product, created or developed using TECHNOLOGY, or for which the development, manufacture, use or sale, if done by a third party without rights
</DIV>
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGEBREAKAREA" STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10PT; CLEAR: BOTH; MARGIN-TOP: 10PT">
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGENUMBERAREA" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 8PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	2
</DIV>
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGEBREAK" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: ALWAYS">
<HR STYLE="BORDER-LEFT-WIDTH: 0PX; HEIGHT: 2PX; BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: 0PX; BORDER-BOTTOM-WIDTH: 0PX; COLOR: #000000; CLEAR: BOTH; MARGIN: 4PX 0PX; BORDER-TOP-WIDTH: 0PX; WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000" NOSHADE="NOSHADE">
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage113"></A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 0PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 0PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.05PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 13PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 13PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 8.8PT; MARGIN-TOP: 1.55PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.35PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 2.95PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0.25PT">
	under the LICENSED PATENT(S), would constitute an infringement of a VALID CLAIM of PATENT RIGHTS (infringement shall include, but is not limited to, direct, contributory,&#160; or inducement to infringe).
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.65PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 8.1PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.3PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 2.75PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36.25PT">
	1.11
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"LICENSED SERVICE"
</FONT>
	includes any service or services, including any drug discovery or screening,&#160;&#160; or the manufacture&#160; of any product or the use of any product&#160; or composition, performed by LICENSEE, AFFILIATED COMPANIES or SUBLICENSEES for any third party using or incorporating the TECHNOLOGY, or which,&#160; if done by a third party without rights under the LICENSED PATENT(S), would constitute an infringement of a VALID CLAIM of PATENT&#160; RIGHTS&#160; (infringement&#160; shall include,&#160; but is not limited to, direct, contributory, or inducement to infringe).
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.75PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 43.85PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF">
	1.12
</FONT>
<FONT ID="TRGRRTFTOHTMLTAB" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 5.63PT">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"LICENSED TERRITORY"
</FONT>
	shall be that territory described on EXHIBIT A.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.05PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 12PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 43.85PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.95PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF">
	1.13
</FONT>
<FONT ID="TRGRRTFTOHTMLTAB" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 5.63PT">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"MAJOR MARKET COUNTRY"
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF">
	is defined in Section 9(d) of EXHIBIT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF">
	A.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.3PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 12PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 6.9PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.3PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 4.2PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36.7PT">
	1.14&#160; &#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"NET REVENUES"
</FONT>
	whether they be NET SALES REVENUES&#160; OR NET SERVICE REVENUES shall include everything of&#160; value received by LICENSEE, AFFILIATED COMPANIES and SUBLICENSEE(S) for the sale, license, lease or other transfer of&#160; LICENSED PRODUCTS, or the performance of LICENSED SERVICES.&#160;&#160; Consideration includes but is not limited to currency, equity, intangible rights, services and other things of value provided or received as part of the transaction for LICENSED PRODUCTS or LICENSED SERVICES, the fair value of which must be included to determine NET REVENUES.&#160; NET REVENUES shall be calculated by LICENSEE in good faith and may be calculated using the accrual or cash method, but such calculation must be consistent from month to month and year to year, and must be the same method used by LICENSEE for all similar transactions, or if none, the same method used generally by LICENSEE in reporting its business activity for United States federal tax purposes.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.45PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 6.9PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.25PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.45PT; TEXT-INDENT: 34.3PT">
	NET REVENUES may exclude the following&#160; items, but only to the extent that they are included in gross revenue, and are separately&#160; billed to purchaser, and paid or remitted by LICENSEE, AFFILIATED COMPANIES or SUBLICENSEES to third parties:
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.8PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 110.55PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.25PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.15PT; TEXT-INDENT: -34.3PT">
	(i)&#160; &#160; &#160;&#160; import, export,&#160; excise&#160; and sales taxes,&#160; custom&#160; duties,&#160; and shipping charges;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.55PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 76PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF">
	(ii)
</FONT>
<FONT ID="TRGRRTFTOHTMLTAB" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 5.67PT">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF">
	customary discounts and rebates;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.3PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 12PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 75.75PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF">
	(iii)
</FONT>
<FONT ID="TRGRRTFTOHTMLTAB" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 5.71PT">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF">
	reasonable credits or refunds for claims or returns;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.05PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 12PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 110.1PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.35PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 6.45PT; TEXT-INDENT: -34.3PT">
	(iv)&#160; &#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; costs of packing, insurance covering damage during shipping, storage and transportation from the place of manufacture to the customer's premises or point of installation;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.65PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 109.85PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.25PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.3PT; TEXT-INDENT: -34.3PT">
	(v)&#160; &#160; &#160;&#160;&#160; any other reductions or specifically identified amounts included in the gross selling&#160; price permitted or required by Generally Accepted Accounting Principles (GAAP) as in effect from time to time in the United States with respect to the determination of net sales revenues.
</DIV>
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGEBREAKAREA" STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10PT; CLEAR: BOTH; MARGIN-TOP: 10PT">
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGENUMBERAREA" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 8PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	3
</DIV>
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGEBREAK" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: ALWAYS">
<HR STYLE="BORDER-LEFT-WIDTH: 0PX; HEIGHT: 2PX; BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: 0PX; BORDER-BOTTOM-WIDTH: 0PX; COLOR: #000000; CLEAR: BOTH; MARGIN: 4PX 0PX; BORDER-TOP-WIDTH: 0PX; WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000" NOSHADE="NOSHADE">
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage114"></A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 0PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 0PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.5PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 13PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 13PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 8.1PT; MARGIN-TOP: 1.55PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.3PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 2.35PT; TEXT-INDENT: 35.5PT">
	NET REVENUES, whether they be NET SALES REVENUES OR NET SERVICE REVENUES,&#160; of any COMBINATION&#160; PRODUCT&#160; (as defined&#160; below) for the purpose of calculating royalties due under this Agreement shall be determined&#160; as follows:&#160;&#160; the NET REVENUES&#160; of the&#160; COMBINATION&#160; PRODUCT&#160; (prior&#160; to application&#160; of the following adjustment) shall be multiplied by the fraction A/(A+B), where A is the net selling price of a LICENSED PRODUCT or LICENSED SERVICE without the additional active ingredient or components or services in the COMBTNATION PRODUCT, if sold separately, and B is the net selling price of any other active ingredients, components or services&#160; in the combination if sold separately.&#160; All net selling prices of the elements of such end-user product or service shall be calculated as the average net selling price of the said elements during the applicable accounting period for which the NET SALES are being calculated.&#160;&#160; In the event that no separate sale of either such above-designated&#160; LICENSED PRODUCT or LICENSED SERVICE (containing only such LICENSED PRODUCT or LICENSED SERVICE and no other active ingredients or components or service(s)) or any one or more of the active ingredients included in such COMBINATION&#160; PRODUCT are made during the accounting period in which the sale was made, or if the net selling price for an active ingredient cannot be determined for an accounting period, NET REVENUES allocable to the LICENSED PRODUCT or LICENSED SERVICE shall be determined by mutual agreement reached in good faith by the parties prior to the end of the accounting period in question based on an equitable method of determining same that takes into account all relevant factors (including the relative contribution of each active ingredient, component or service in the combination, and relative value to the end user of each such active ingredient, component or service).&#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"COMBINATION PRODUCT"
</FONT>
	shall mean a LICENSED PRODUCT or LICENSED SERVICE that includes at least one additional active ingredient or components or key service(s) that is not covered by a LICENSED PATENT.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.45PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 8.3PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.55PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 4.9PT; TEXT-INDENT: 34.3PT">
	For the avoidance of doubt, NET REVENUES shall not include SUBLICENSING INCOME.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.3PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 7.35PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.25PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 4.6PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36.25PT">
	1.15&#160; &#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"NET SALES REVENUES"
</FONT>
	shall mean NET REVENUES derived from the sale of LICENSED PRODUCTS, where a sale includes any license of use, lease, sale or other transfer of rights to the LICENSED PRODUCT.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.8PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 7.6PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.25PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.6PT; TEXT-INDENT: 35.75PT">
	1.16&#160; &#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"NET SERVICE REVENUES"
</FONT>
	shall mean NET REVENUES derived from the sale or performance of LICENSED SERVICES.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.8PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 6.9PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.3PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.2PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36.25PT">
	1.17&#160; &#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"PATENT&#160;&#160; COSTS"
</FONT>
	&#160;&#160; are&#160; all&#160; costs&#160; of&#160; prosecuting&#160;&#160; and&#160; maintaining&#160;&#160; any LICENSED&#160; PATENT, including&#160; reasonable attorneys'&#160; fees or costs paid or incurred, and expenses paid or incurred for filing, maintenance, annuities, translation, cost of defending or protecting a patent from infringement, or other costs directly related to the PATENT prosecution and protection.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.5PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 6.9PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.55PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.65PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36.25PT">
	1.18&#160; &#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"PATENT RIGHTS"
</FONT>
	are those rights granted to LICENSEE under LICENSED PATENT(S).
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.3PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 6.65PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.35PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 6.25PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT">
	1.19&#160; &#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"SUBLICENSE"
</FONT>
	shall mean an agreement&#160; between LICENSEE and a third party, other than an AFFILIATED COMPANY, granting such third party any present or future rights in the TECHNOLOGY licensed hereunder.
</DIV>
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGEBREAKAREA" STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10PT; CLEAR: BOTH; MARGIN-TOP: 10PT">
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGENUMBERAREA" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 8PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	4
</DIV>
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGEBREAK" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: ALWAYS">
<HR STYLE="BORDER-LEFT-WIDTH: 0PX; HEIGHT: 2PX; BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: 0PX; BORDER-BOTTOM-WIDTH: 0PX; COLOR: #000000; CLEAR: BOTH; MARGIN: 4PX 0PX; BORDER-TOP-WIDTH: 0PX; WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000" NOSHADE="NOSHADE">
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage115"></A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 0PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 0PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.6PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 13PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 13PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 7.85PT; MARGIN-TOP: 1.5PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.35PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 3.4PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT">
	1.20&#160; &#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"SUBLICENSEE"
</FONT>
	shall mean any person or entity other than an AFFILIATED COMPANY to which LICENSEE has granted a SUBLICENSE under this Agreement.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.95PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 10PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 10PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 7.6PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.3PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 4.05PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT">
	1.21&#160; &#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"SUBLICENSING INCOME"
</FONT>
	includes&#160; everything&#160; of&#160; value&#160; received&#160; by LICENSEE in&#160; consideration&#160; for any SUBLICENSE which includes rights to any TECHNOLOGY licensed herein. It is the total amount received as adjusted pursuant to Section
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 8.8PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.6PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 3.3PT">
	11.3 of EXHIBIT A hereto, whether or not) the SUBLICENSE includes intellectual property in
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 7.35PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0.8PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.4PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 3.9PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0.25PT">
	addition to the licensed&#160; TECHNOLOGY,&#160; and includes the SUBLICENSE fee, milestone payments,&#160; stock or other forms of equity,&#160; and the fair value&#160; of any services&#160; or other compensation&#160; received.&#160; &#160; Payment remitted to JHU by LICENSEE&#160; shall be calculated&#160; by LICENSEE in good faith.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.15PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 42.15PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
	The following may be excluded from the gross amount received for the SUBLICENSE
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 7.1PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0.8PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 238.5PT">
	when calculating SUBLICENSING INCOME:
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.85PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 110.3PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.3PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 4.1PT; TEXT-INDENT: -33.85PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF">
	(i)&#160; &#160; &#160;&#160;
</FONT>
	The reasonable cost of services to be performed thereafter by LICENSEE for or on behalf of the SUBLICENSEE, if, but only if those services are specifically described and the cost itemized and stated separately in the SUBLICENSE.&#160; Payments on the achievement of results shall be deemed to be milestone payments and are included in SUBLICENSING INCOME.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.75PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 110.3PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.35PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 4.95PT; TEXT-INDENT: -34.1PT">
	(ii)&#160; &#160; &#160; Reimbursement of the amount paid for fees incurred by LICENSEE, such as patent costs, or fees paid to governmental agencies, which are incurred after the date of the SUBLICENSE and are actually paid to third parties by LICENSEE.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.45PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.25PT">
<TABLE ID="0C65B4D2F5A54E7F92C98ADB509F7797" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 76PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 34.3PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(iii)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	Royalty payments to LICENSEE based on SUBLICENSEE's NET REVENUES, where royalties are provided and will be paid to JHU on SUBLICENSEE's NET REVENUES pursuant to this Agreement.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.8PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.35PT">
<TABLE ID="33831FA37F8342F6881BCFDE2567BC06" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 76PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 68PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(iv)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	The amount of any Milestone payment made to JHU under this Agreement as a result of activity of LICENSEE or SUBLICENSEE, which results in a Milestone payment by SUBLICENSEE to LICENSEE under the SUBLICENSE.&#160; The difference between the Milestone payment to be paid to JHU and the milestone payment paid to LICENSEE by SUBLICENSEE shall be considered SUBLICENSING INCOME.&#160; For clarification, if SUBLICENSEE makes a payment to LICENSEE as a Milestone, and LICENSEE is obligated to make a Milestone payment to JHU under this Agreement for that same Milestone, that Milestone payment amount paid to JHU shall be deducted from the Milestone amount paid under the SUBLICENSE, and&#160; the remainder shall be the SUBLICENSING INCOME.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.45PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 109.6PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.35PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.9PT; TEXT-INDENT: -34.1PT">
	(v)&#160; &#160; &#160; The&#160; amount&#160; received&#160; for&#160; technology&#160; of&#160; third&#160; parties&#160; acquired&#160; by LICENSEE&#160; and&#160; included&#160; in the&#160; SUBLICENSE,&#160; if said&#160; amount&#160; is separately stated in the SUBLICENSE.
</DIV>
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGEBREAKAREA" STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10PT; CLEAR: BOTH; MARGIN-TOP: 10PT">
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGENUMBERAREA" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 8PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	5
</DIV>
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGEBREAK" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: ALWAYS">
<HR STYLE="BORDER-LEFT-WIDTH: 0PX; HEIGHT: 2PX; BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: 0PX; BORDER-BOTTOM-WIDTH: 0PX; COLOR: #000000; CLEAR: BOTH; MARGIN: 4PX 0PX; BORDER-TOP-WIDTH: 0PX; WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000" NOSHADE="NOSHADE">
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage116"></A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 0PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 0PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 1PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 13PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 13PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 111.3PT; MARGIN-TOP: 1.55PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.3PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 2.5PT; TEXT-INDENT: -33.85PT">
	(vi)&#160; &#160;&#160; Reimbursement from SUBLICENSEE of costs and expenses actually paid by LICENSEE for the development of any LICENSED PRODUCT or LICENSED SERVICE,-including any costs and expenses incurred prior to the date of the SUBLICENSE,&#160; provided that such reimbursements are clearly delineated in writing in such SUBLICENSE.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.75PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 7.6PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.35PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 2.25PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0.25PT">
	If the SUBLICENSE includes the right or obligation of the SUBLICENSEE to purchase equity in LICENSEE at a cost greater than the then current fair market value of the equity (as determined by LICENSEE in good faith),&#160; the difference between the fair market value and the amount paid shall be SUBLICENSING INCOME.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.45PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 7.35PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.35PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 2.95PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT">
	1.22&#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"TECHNOLOGY"
</FONT>
	means the LICENSED PATENT(S), data, KNOW HOW, manufacturing&#160; techniques,&#160; and&#160; any&#160; other&#160; information&#160; or&#160; material&#160; provided&#160; by JHU&#160; to LICENSEE. TECHNOLOGY may or may not be confidential in nature.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.45PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 5.9PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.3PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 3.2PT; TEXT-INDENT: 37.2PT">
	1.23&#160; &#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"VALID CLAIM"
</FONT>
	means (a) a claim of an issued patent that has not expired or been abandoned, or been revoked, held invalid or unenforceable by a patent office, court or other governmental agency of competent jurisdiction&#160; in a final and non-appealable judgment (or judgment from which no appeal was taken within the allowable time period) or (b) patent application that (i) has been filed with a good faith belief that claims are reasonable,&#160; (ii) has not lapsed, in the case of a provisional patent application, (iii) and has not been cancelled, withdrawn or abandoned without the possibility of revival; and (iv) has been pending for less than or equal to seven (7) years from the earliest priority date claimed for such application and for which there has been reasonably consistent activity on the part of JHU to advance to issuance of a patent.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.2PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 12PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 6.65PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 378PT">
	2.&#160; &#160; &#160; &#160; GRANT
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.6PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 6.4PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.35PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 3.7PT; TEXT-INDENT: 34.8PT">
	2.1&#160; &#160; &#160;&#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Grant.&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
	Subject to the terms and conditions of this Agreement, JHU grants LICENSEE an EXCLUSIVE LICENSE under the LICENSED PATENT(S)&#160; and a nonexclusive right under other TECHNOLOGY in the LICENSED&#160; FIELD(S) of USE to utilize the TECHNOLOGY&#160; to&#160; make,&#160; have&#160; made,&#160; use,&#160; import,&#160; offer&#160; to&#160; sell&#160; and&#160; sell&#160; LICENSED PRODUCTS and perform LICENSED SERVICES in the LICENSED TERRITORY. This Grant shall&#160; apply&#160; to&#160; the&#160; LICENSEE&#160; and&#160; any&#160; AFFILIATED&#160;&#160; COMPANY,&#160;&#160; except&#160; that&#160; any AFFILIATED COMPANY shall not have the right to sublicense others without JHU approval, such approval not to be unreasonably withheld.&#160;&#160; If any AFFILIATED COMPANY exercises rights under this Agreement, such AFFILIATED COMPANY shall be bound by all terms and conditions of this Agreement, including but not limited to indemnity and insurance provisions and royalty payments.&#160; In addition, LICENSEE shall remain fully liable to JHU for all acts and obligations of such AFFILIATED COMPANY such that acts of the AFFILIATED COMPANY shall be considered acts of the LICENSEE.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.7PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 40.7PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF">
	2.2
</FONT>
<FONT ID="TRGRRTFTOHTMLTAB" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 5.72PT">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Retained Rights.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.05PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 12PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 5.7PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.35PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.05PT; TEXT-INDENT: 69.85PT">
	2.2.1&#160;&#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	JHU Rights.&#160;
</FONT>
	JHU retains the right, on behalf of itself, the INVENTORS and all other non-profit academic or research institutions to whom JHU extends rights, to practice a LICENSED PATENT and use TECHNOLOGY solely for any non-commercial non- profit research&#160; or other non-commercial non-profit purpose, including, but not limited to non-
</DIV>
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGEBREAKAREA" STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10PT; CLEAR: BOTH; MARGIN-TOP: 10PT">
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGENUMBERAREA" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 8PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	6
</DIV>
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGEBREAK" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: ALWAYS">
<HR STYLE="BORDER-LEFT-WIDTH: 0PX; HEIGHT: 2PX; BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: 0PX; BORDER-BOTTOM-WIDTH: 0PX; COLOR: #000000; CLEAR: BOTH; MARGIN: 4PX 0PX; BORDER-TOP-WIDTH: 0PX; WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000" NOSHADE="NOSHADE">
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage117"></A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 0PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 0PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.55PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 14PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 9.55PT; MARGIN-TOP: 1.55PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.3PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 2.3PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0.7PT">
	commercial sponsored research and collaborations solely with non-commercial&#160; entities. JHU shall have the right to publish any information included in the TECHNOLOGY or a LICENSED PATENT.&#160; &#160; In order to balance this right with&#160; LICENSEE's exclusive&#160; rights under this Agreement, INVENTORS will submit any and all proposed&#160; disclosures&#160; related to the TECHNOLOGY or a LICENSED PATENT in the LICENSED FIELD OF USE to LICENSEE for its review at least thirty (30) days prior to the scheduled disclosure of the results to any third party (including, without limitation, to any journal for review). LICENSEE will complete its review within thirty (30) days of receipt of the submitted documents. LICENSEE may request that INVENTORS delete from the documents any reference to LICENSEE's Confidential Information. If, during its thirty (30) day review period, LICENSEE notifies JHU and/or INVENTORS that it desires to file patent applications&#160;&#160; on any inventions disclosed in the documents, INVENTORS will defer publication/disclosure for up to sixty (60) additional days from the date of submission of the document to LICENSEE.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.45PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 78.5PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF">
	2.2.2
</FONT>
<FONT ID="TRGRRTFTOHTMLTAB" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 5.75PT">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Government Rights.
</FONT>
	This Agreement is subject to Title 35 Sections 200-
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 9.1PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0.75PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.3PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 4.25PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0.25PT">
	204 of the United States Code as implemented in 37 CFR Part 401, as may be amended from time to time. Among other things, these provisions provide the United States Government with certain nonexclusive rights in a LICENSED PATENT if federal funds were used to develop the TECHNOLOGY.&#160; They also impose the obligation&#160; that LICENSED&#160; PRODUCTS&#160; sold or produced in the United States be "manufactured substantially in the United States". LICENSEE will ensure all required obligations of these provisions are met.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.45PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 43.55PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF">
	2.3
</FONT>
<FONT ID="TRGRRTFTOHTMLTAB" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 5.74PT">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Specific Exclusions.
</FONT>
	JHU does not:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.25PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 12PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 8.85PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.25PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 4.95PT; TEXT-INDENT: 69.2PT">

	2.3.1

<FONT ID="TRGRRTFTOHTMLTAB" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 5.66PT">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF">
	commit to LICENSEE to bring suit against third parties for infringement, except as described in Article 9; or
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.75PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 9.1PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.25PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.8PT; TEXT-INDENT: 68.95PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF">
	2.3.2

	agree&#160; to&#160; furnish&#160; to&#160; LICENSEE&#160;&#160; any&#160; technology&#160;&#160; or&#160; technological information other than the TECHNOLOGY; or
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.5PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 43.1PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.35PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 4.65PT; TEXT-INDENT: 34.95PT">
	2.3.3&#160;&#160; agree to provide LICENSEE with any know how, invention, data, results or other assistance&#160; in the future&#160; unless specifically&#160; and clearly&#160; identified&#160; in this Agreement.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.4PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 8.15PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.25PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.8PT; TEXT-INDENT: 34.95PT">
	2.4&#160; &#160;&#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Global Access for Essential Medicines.&#160; &#160;
</FONT>
	This Agreement&#160; is subject to the provisions of Exhibit D: GLOBAL ACCESS FOR ESSENTIAL MEDICINES.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.25PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 12PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 8.15PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 333.6PT">
	3.&#160; &#160; &#160; &#160; SUBLICENSING
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.55PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 8.15PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.5PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 6.1PT; TEXT-INDENT: 35.2PT">
	3.1&#160; &#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Permitted Sublicensing.&#160;
</FONT>
	LICENSEE may grant sublicenses in the LICENSED FIELD of USE in the LICENSED TERRITORY.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.3PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 7.65PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.4PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 6.1PT; TEXT-INDENT: 35.2PT">
	3.2&#160; &#160; &#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Royalty on Sales.&#160;
</FONT>
	LICENSEE shall&#160; be responsible to pay to JHU royalties due JHU on sales of LICENSED PRODUCTS or LICENSED SERVICES by a SUBLICENSEE, to the same extent as if LICENSEE made those sales directly, and whether or not SUBLICENSEE remits required royalty payments to LICENSEE.
</DIV>
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGEBREAKAREA" STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10PT; CLEAR: BOTH; MARGIN-TOP: 10PT">
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGENUMBERAREA" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 8PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	7
</DIV>
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGEBREAK" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: ALWAYS">
<HR STYLE="BORDER-LEFT-WIDTH: 0PX; HEIGHT: 2PX; BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: 0PX; BORDER-BOTTOM-WIDTH: 0PX; COLOR: #000000; CLEAR: BOTH; MARGIN: 4PX 0PX; BORDER-TOP-WIDTH: 0PX; WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000" NOSHADE="NOSHADE">
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage118"></A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 0PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 0PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.25PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 14PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 8.35PT; MARGIN-TOP: 1.55PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.3PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 2.5PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36.25PT">
	3.3&#160; &#160; &#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Required Sublicensing.
</FONT>
	LICENSEE will use commercially reasonable efforts to diligently develop markets for, and develop, manufacture, and sell LICENSED PRODUCTS and LICENSED SERVICES in each MAJOR MARKET COUNTRY and ASIA COUNTRY, as per the terms and conditions of Section 4.2 and Exhibit A, Diligence Milestones.&#160;&#160; Within two (2) years of the EFFECTIVE DATE, LICENSEE shall submit to JHU a detailed commercialization plan&#160; for&#160; entering&#160; into&#160; each&#160; MAJOR&#160; MARKET&#160; COUNTRY&#160; AND&#160; ASIA&#160; COUNTRY. LICENSEE and JHU shall negotiate such commercialization plan in good faith and such agreed commercialization plan shall be added to this LICENSE AGREEMENT by amendment.&#160; Within four (4) years of the EFFECTIVE DATE, LICENSEE shall achieve dosing of the first patient outside the United States in a Confirmatory Phase II Clinical Trial or foreign equivalent. Should LICENSEE be unable or unwilling to commercialize a potential LICENSED PRODUCT in a particular MAJOR MARKET COUNTRY OR ASIA COUNTRY (an "Unmarketed Country") per such agreed ex-US commercialization plan, or following&#160; the fifth anniversary&#160; of the EFFECTIVE DATE,&#160;&#160; whichever&#160; is later, LICENSEE will, at JHU's&#160; request, consider&#160; and negotiate in good faith a SUBLICENSE with any such potential SUBLICENSEE.&#160; &#160; Should LICENSEE elect not to consider and negotiate in good faith such sublicense in such Unmarketed Country,&#160; LICENSEE&#160; agrees&#160; to terminate&#160; rights in such&#160; Unmarketed&#160; Country&#160; under this Agreement per the terms of Paragraph 11.2 (Termination by LICENSEE).
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.45PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 26.7PT">

	3.4

<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	SUBLICENSE Requirements.

	is subject to this Agreement;

</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 77.25PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0.65PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF">
	(ii)
</FONT>
<FONT ID="TRGRRTFTOHTMLTAB" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 5.63PT">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF">
	will not permit a SUBLICENSEE to further sublicense;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.3PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 12PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 77.25PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF">
	(iii)
</FONT>
<FONT ID="TRGRRTFTOHTMLTAB" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 5.63PT">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF">
	will, as a condition of validity, expressly include the provisions of Articles
</FONT>
	7, 8, 10.3 and 12.2 for the benefit of JHU;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.3PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 12PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 111.55PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.25PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.15PT; TEXT-INDENT: -34.55PT">
	(iv)&#160; &#160; will, if this Agreement is terminated, require the transfer to JHU of all obligations,
<FONT ID="TRGRRTFTOHTMLTAB" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 6PT">
	&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
	including&#160;&#160; the&#160; payment&#160;&#160; of&#160; royalties&#160;&#160; specified&#160;&#160; in&#160; the SUBLICENSE, without setoff for debts or obligations of LICENSEE to SUBLICENSEE; and
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12PT">
</DIV>
<EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<A NAME="FIS_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE_39"></A>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 111.3PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.25PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.3PT; TEXT-INDENT: -34.8PT">
	(v)&#160; &#160; &#160; will not be valid against JHU as to terms, conditions, obligations or limitations that are inconsistent with this Agreement and&#160; these sublicensing requirements.
</DIV>
</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.8PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 6.45PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.3PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.55PT; TEXT-INDENT: 35.5PT">
	3.5&#160; &#160; &#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Notice and Copy of SUBLICENSE; Termination.
</FONT>
	LICENSEE will notify JHU and within 30 days of execution will submit to JHU an unredacted copy of each SUBLICENSE, the terms of which will not be considered confidential as to JHU, but which terms JHU will treat as LICENSEE confidential information.&#160; If JHU terminates this Agreement, JHU=shall grant to such SUBLICENSEE&#160; license rights and terms equivalent to the sublicense rights and terms which LICENSEE shall have granted to such SUBLICENSEE, provided that (i) SUBLICENSEE is not in material breach of&#160; its sublicense and (ii)&#160; such sublicense terms and conditions are consistent with the terms and conditions of this Agreement.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 1PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 41.25PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF">
	3.6
</FONT>
<FONT ID="TRGRRTFTOHTMLTAB" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 5.63PT">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Sharing of SUBLICENSING INCOME.
</FONT>
	LICENSEE will share with and pay to
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 6.45PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0.25PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
	JHU a portion of SUBLICENSING INCOME as stated on EXHIBIT
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF">
	A.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGEBREAKAREA" STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10PT; CLEAR: BOTH; MARGIN-TOP: 10PT">
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGENUMBERAREA" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 8PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	8
</DIV>
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGEBREAK" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: ALWAYS">

<A NAME="eolPage119"></A>

<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 0PT">

<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.75PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 13PT">

</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN-LEFT: 10.05PT; MARGIN-TOP: 1.55PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	4.
</FONT>
<FONT ID="TRGRRTFTOHTMLTAB" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 5.66PT">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	DILIGENCE REPORTING AND DEVELOPMENT
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.85PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 9.55PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.55PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 2.4PT; TEXT-INDENT: 35.05PT">
	4.1&#160; &#160; &#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Federal Funding.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF">
	It
</FONT>
	is the requirement of federal law, and the obligation of JHU and LICENSEE that inventions created with federal funding be diligently developed into useful products and services.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.05PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 9.3PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.35PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 3.1PT; TEXT-INDENT: 35.05PT">
	4.2&#160; &#160; &#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Milestones.&#160;
</FONT>
	LICENSEE will use commercially reasonable efforts to&#160; diligently develop&#160; markets&#160; for&#160; and&#160; develop,&#160; manufacture,&#160; and&#160; sell&#160; LICENSED&#160; PRODUCTS&#160; and LICENSED SERVICES in the United States and those other portions of the Territory where Company LICENSEE deems it commercially prudent, subject to the terms and conditions of Section 3.3. In addition, LICENSEE will use commercially&#160; reasonable efforts to meet the milestones and target dates, if any, shown in EXHIBIT A, and notify JHU in writing within 30 days after each milestone is met.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.45PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 8.85PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.3PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 3.85PT; TEXT-INDENT: 35.05PT">
	4.3&#160; &#160; &#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Diligence Report.&#160;
</FONT>
	By March 1
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	&#160;
</FONT>
	of each year, LICENSEE will submit a written annual&#160; report to JHU covering&#160; the&#160; preceding&#160; calendar&#160; year. Reports&#160; may be submitted electronically to&#160; an email address provided on request by JHU.&#160; The report will follow the Diligence Report Guidelines stated on EXHIBIT C and shall include information sufficient to enable JHU to satisfy reporting requirements of the U.S. Government and for JHU to ascertain progress by LICENSEE toward meeting this Agreement's diligence requirements. Each report will include LICENSEE's most recent annual report filed with the United States Securities and Exchange Commission, if applicable, and describe, where relevant:
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.45PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.3PT">
<TABLE ID="FD5E2302E3174BDCA9ECCA1A8398C009" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 78.45PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 33.85PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(i)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	progress&#160; &#160; by&#160; LICENSEE,&#160;&#160; AFFILIATED&#160;&#160; COMPANIES&#160;&#160; or SUBLICENSEE(S)&#160; &#160;&#160; toward&#160; &#160; &#160; commercialization&#160; &#160; &#160; of&#160; &#160;&#160; LICENSED PRODUCTS or LICENSED SERVICES,&#160; including work completed, key scientific discoveries, summary of work-in-progress, current schedule of anticipated events or milestones, market plans (if any) for introduction of LICENSED PRODUCTS or LICENSED SERVICES, and significant corporate transactions involving LICENSED PRODUCTS or LICENSED SERVICES;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.45PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 111.8PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.35PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 4.85PT; TEXT-INDENT: -33.85PT">
	(ii)&#160; &#160; &#160; (notice&#160; of&#160; all FDA&#160; or other&#160; governmental&#160; filings&#160; and/or&#160; approvals regarding any LICENSED PRODUCTS or LICENSED SERVICE made or
<FONT ID="TRGRRTFTOHTMLTAB" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 6PT">
	&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
	obtained&#160; &#160;&#160; by&#160; &#160; LICENSEE,&#160; &#160;&#160; AFFILIATED&#160; &#160;&#160; COMPANY&#160; &#160;&#160; or SUBLICENSEE, the patents or patent applications licensed under this Agreement&#160; upon&#160; which&#160; such&#160; product&#160; or service&#160; is based,&#160; and the commercial name of such product or service;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.45PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 111.55PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.35PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.1PT; TEXT-INDENT: -33.85PT">
	(iii)&#160; &#160;&#160; a Certificate of Insurance or other evidence of insurance, as required by this Agreement, or a statement of why such insurance is not currently required;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.65PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 111.3PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.25PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.5PT; TEXT-INDENT: -33.85PT">
	(iv)&#160; &#160;&#160; identification of all AFFILIATED COMPANIES and SUBLICENSEE(S) which have exercised rights to the TECHNOLOGY, or a statement that no AFFILIATED COMPANY or SUBLICENSEE has exercised such rights;

	9

<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.5PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 112.5PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.5PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 3.15PT; TEXT-INDENT: -34.25PT">
