</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.3PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 112.25PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.35PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 3PT; TEXT-INDENT: -34PT">
	(vii)&#160; &#160; Notification of any change of control or name change or other significant change related to this Agreement or LICENSEE that would be relevant to the TECHNOLOGY licensed hereunder.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.65PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 8.8PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF">
	5.
</FONT>
<FONT ID="TRGRRTFTOHTMLTAB" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 5.7PT">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	FEES, ROYALTIES AND OTHER PAYMENTS
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.05PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 12PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 8.1PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.35PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 3.6PT; TEXT-INDENT: 35.45PT">
	5.1&#160; &#160; &#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	License&#160; Fee.
</FONT>
	&#160;&#160; LICENSEE shall pay to JHU a noncreditable,&#160; nonrefundable license fee as described in EXHIBIT A, within 30 days of the EFFECTIVE DATE, or at such time as stated on Exhibit A.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.4PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 8.1PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.3PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 3.85PT; TEXT-INDENT: 35.2PT">
	5.2&#160; &#160; &#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	PATENT COSTS.
</FONT>
	Within 30 days of receipt of an invoice from JHU showing unreimbursed PATENT COSTS incurred on or after the EFFECTIVE DATE, LICENSEE will reimburse JHU the amount stated. EXHIBIT A may include unreimbursed PATENT COSTS incurred prior to the EFFECTIVE DATE, and if so, LICENSEE will reimburse JHU the amount stated in EXHIBIT A at such time or in such manner as stated in EXHIBIT A.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.45PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 7.35PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.3PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 3.9PT; TEXT-INDENT: 35.45PT">
	5.3&#160; &#160;&#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Minimum Annual Royalty.
</FONT>
	&#160;&#160; LICENSEE will pay JHU a yearly Minimum Annual Royalty (MAR) as described in Exhibit A, which will be paid in advance within 30 days after the anniversary of the EFFECTIVE DATE in each calendar year and which will apply to that calendar year. Minimum Annual Royalty payments are nonrefundable. Milestone payments and earned royalty payments due on NET REVENUES occurring in the year to which the MAR pertains may be offset against the Minimum Annual Royalty paid for that year, but only for that year, without carry forward or back.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.45PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 7.15PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.3PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.2PT; TEXT-INDENT: 35.45PT">
	5.4&#160; &#160; &#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Milestone Payments.
</FONT>
	LICENSEE will pay JHU Milestone payments as stated on Exhibit A. Within 30 days of achieving a Milestone, LICENSEE will report the achievement to JHU, and pay to JHU the Milestone payment required. Milestones achieved should be included in the Annual Report, even if previously reported.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.7PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 42.3PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF">
	5.5
</FONT>
<FONT ID="TRGRRTFTOHTMLTAB" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 5.62PT">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Earned Royalty.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.05PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 12PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 6.65PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.35PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.2PT; TEXT-INDENT: 69.9PT">
	5.5.1&#160;&#160; LICENSEE will pay JHU earned royalties, as described on Exhibit A, which shall be paid quarterly&#160; unless a different&#160; payment schedule&#160; is specifically&#160; stated. LICENSEE may deduct from the earned royalty the amount of any Minimum Annual Royalty paid for the year in which the quarter occurs, until all of the MAR has been deducted from payments due for that year, after which any earned royalty in excess of the MAR shall be paid to JHU.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.4PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 6.65PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.3PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.3PT; TEXT-INDENT: 69.7PT">
	5.5.2&#160;&#160; Should LICENSEE&#160; be required&#160; to pay royalties&#160; on any intellectual property rights not licensed hereunder ("Other Royalties")&#160; that would be infringed or violated by making,&#160; using or selling a particular&#160; LICENSED&#160; PRODUCT&#160; or LICENSED&#160; SERVICE, LICENSEE shall be entitled to credit fifty percent (50%)&#160; of such&#160; Other Royalties against the
</DIV>
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGEBREAKAREA" STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10PT; CLEAR: BOTH; MARGIN-TOP: 10PT">
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGENUMBERAREA" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 8PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	10
</DIV>
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGEBREAK" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: ALWAYS">
<HR STYLE="BORDER-LEFT-WIDTH: 0PX; HEIGHT: 2PX; BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: 0PX; BORDER-BOTTOM-WIDTH: 0PX; COLOR: #000000; CLEAR: BOTH; MARGIN: 4PX 0PX; BORDER-TOP-WIDTH: 0PX; WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000" NOSHADE="NOSHADE">
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage121"></A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 0PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 0PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.5PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 13PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 13PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 7.3PT; MARGIN-TOP: 1.55PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.35PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 2.85PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0.25PT">
	running royalty due to JHU, provided that the royalties due to JHU hereunder shall not be reduced below fifty percent (50%) of those that would otherwise be due to JHU for that LICENSED PRODUCT or LICENSED SERVICE.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.45PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 7.1PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.35PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 3.15PT; TEXT-INDENT: 35.3PT">
	5.6&#160; &#160; &#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Duration of Royalty Payments.
</FONT>
	Royalties shall be paid as described herein for each&#160; LICENSED&#160; PRODUCT&#160; manufactured&#160; or produced&#160; or&#160; each&#160; LICENSED&#160; SERVICE performed in the LICENSED TERRITORY for a minimum period, on a country-by-country basis,&#160; of ten (10)&#160; years from&#160; date&#160; of FIRST COMMERCIAL&#160; SALE&#160; of that&#160; particular LICENSED PRODUCT or LICENSED SERVICE or the life of the last to expire patent included within the PATENT RIGHTS, whichever is last to occur. Products manufactured during the life of the PATENT RIGHTS shall carry the full royalty when sold.&#160; &#160; Royalties&#160; on products manufactured and sold within the minimum ten (10) year period, but for which PATENT RIGHTS are not pending or have expired, shall be reduced by 50%.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.45PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 6.6PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.35PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 4.1PT; TEXT-INDENT: 35.5PT">
	5.7&#160; &#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Payment for all activities performed under this Agreement.
</FONT>
	If LICENSED PRODUCTS are made, used, imported, or offered for sale before the date this Agreement terminates, and those LICENSED PRODUCTS are sold after the termination date, LICENSEE will pay JHU the full earned royalty based on the Net Sales of those LICENSED PRODUCTS. In addition, use of the TECHNOLOGY&#160; by LICENSEE shall be deemed to be use which is licensed under this Agreement, regardless of where performed, whether or not specific PATENT RIGHTS exist in the location of the activity for which activity a royalty or other payment is due under this Agreement.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.2PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 6.35PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.35PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 4.75PT; TEXT-INDENT: 35.3PT">
	5.8&#160; &#160; &#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Obligation to Pay Royalties and other payments.
</FONT>
	Payments required herein must be paid on the dates or upon the conditions stated, notwithstanding any claims by either LICENSEE or third party challenging the validity of the PATENT RIGHTS.&#160;&#160; Payments once made are not refundable even if the PATENT RIGHTS are later determined to be invalid or not applicable to the particular product or service.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.45PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 6.1PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.35PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 4.55PT; TEXT-INDENT: 35.3PT">
	5.9&#160; &#160; &#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Currency.
</FONT>
	For Revenue in currencies other than U.S. Dollars, LICENSEE will calculate the royalty in U.S. Dollars quarterly, using the appropriate foreign exchange rate for the currency as quoted by United States Federal Reserve Bank, for the last business day of each calendar quarter, to apply to payments earned by activities during that quarter. LICENSEE will make royalty payments to JHU in U.S. Dollars.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.2PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 5.65PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.35PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.1PT; TEXT-INDENT: 35.5PT">
	5.10&#160; &#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Non-U.S. Taxes.
</FONT>
	&#160;&#160; If non-U.S. taxes are due on royalty or other payments, such taxes shall be deemed to be in addition to the payment, and LICENSEE will pay all non-U.S. taxes related to royalty and any other payments under this Agreement. These tax payments are not deductible from any payments due to JHU. JHU will cooperate with LICENSEE to receive a refund of such taxes to the extent available, and such refund shall be retained by LICENSEE.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.45PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 6.1PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.55PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.45PT; TEXT-INDENT: 34.8PT">
	5.11&#160; &#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	No requirement of invoice.
</FONT>
	&#160;&#160; All payments are due on the due date without invoice or demand for payment by or from JHU.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.3PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 5.4PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.35PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.75PT; TEXT-INDENT: 35.5PT">
	5.12&#160; &#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Interest.
</FONT>
	Payments are considered due on the dates and at the times described in this Agreement, and if not so stated, within 30 days of the date of the event requiring the payment. Payment is made when received by JHU. Payments not received within 30 days of the
</DIV>
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGEBREAKAREA" STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10PT; CLEAR: BOTH; MARGIN-TOP: 10PT">
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGENUMBERAREA" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 8PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	11
</DIV>
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGEBREAK" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: ALWAYS">
<HR STYLE="BORDER-LEFT-WIDTH: 0PX; HEIGHT: 2PX; BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: 0PX; BORDER-BOTTOM-WIDTH: 0PX; COLOR: #000000; CLEAR: BOTH; MARGIN: 4PX 0PX; BORDER-TOP-WIDTH: 0PX; WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000" NOSHADE="NOSHADE">
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage122"></A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 0PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 0PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7PT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 8.3PT; MARGIN-TOP: 1.55PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.35PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 3.6PT">
	due date shall, beginning on the due date, bear interest at the rate of 6% per annum, whether or not JHU has made a demand for such payment or interest. Acceptance of late payments without interest will not act as a waiver of this provision.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.4PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 7.85PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.5PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 3.15PT; TEXT-INDENT: 35.2PT">
	5.13&#160; &#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Payments and Obligations.&#160;
</FONT>
	All payments and obligations which come due shall be and remain due, and the existence of a dispute shall not suspend any duties under this License Agreement.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.05PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 7.85PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.4PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 2.6PT; TEXT-INDENT: 35.2PT">
	5.14&#160; &#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Invoicing by JHU.&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
	JHU may submit all invoices for any payments due in electronic form via e-mail sent to the e-mail address supplied by LICENSEE from time to time. An invoice directed to the last email address provided by LICENSEE&#160; to JHU shall be deemed received by LICENSEE when sent by JHU.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.1PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 7.85PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.5PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 4.05PT; TEXT-INDENT: 34.7PT">
	5.15&#160; &#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Method of Payment.&#160;
</FONT>
	All payments under this Agreement&#160; shall be made in U.S. Dollars by either check or wire transfer.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.55PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN-LEFT: 40.75PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 275.5PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF">
	5.16
</FONT>

</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN-LEFT: 7.15PT; MARGIN-TOP: 1PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 26.6PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 169.15PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0.25PT">

</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.1PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 13PT">

<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN-LEFT: 8.1PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">

	FED WIRE:
</FONT>
<FONT ID="TRGRRTFTOHTMLTAB" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 5.26PT">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;

</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF">
	*]
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.2PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 13PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 13PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN-LEFT: 7.35PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
	LICENSEE shall be responsible for any and all costs associated with wire transfers.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.5PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 12PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN-LEFT: 7.15PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	6.
</FONT>
<FONT ID="TRGRRTFTOHTMLTAB" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 5.64PT">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	ROYALTY REPORTS AND ACCOUNTING
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.8PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 6.4PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.3PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 2.35PT; TEXT-INDENT: 35.2PT">
	6.1&#160; &#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Quarterly Earned Royalty Payment and Report.&#160;
</FONT>
	Beginning with the FIRST COMMERCIAL SALE of a LICENSED PRODUCT or LICENSED SERVICE, LICENSEE will thereafter submit to JHU a written report 30 days after the end of each calendar quarter (even if there are no sales during that quarter), along with payment of any earned royalty due. This report will be in the form of Exhibit B and will state the number, description, and aggregate NET REVENUES of LICENSED PRODUCTS and LICENSED SERVICES during the completed calendar quarter. Such reports must be filed and payments made during any claim against or challenge to the scope or validity of the PATENT RIGHTS.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.7PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 6.4PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.25PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 3.45PT; TEXT-INDENT: 34.7PT">
	6.2&#160; &#160; &#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	No Refund.&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
	In the event that a validity or non-infringement challenge of a LICENSED PATENT is successful, LICENSEE will have no right to recoup any royalties paid before or during the challenge period.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.75PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 5.7PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.3PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 2.65PT; TEXT-INDENT: 35.2PT">
	6.3&#160; &#160; &#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Termination or Expiration Report.&#160;
</FONT>
	LICENSEE will pay to JHU all applicable royalties and submit to JHU a written report within 90 days after the license expires or terminates. LICENSEE will continue to submit earned royalty payments and reports to JHU after the license terminates, until all LICENSED PRODUCTS made or imported under the license have been sold, and thereafter until the time for paying earned royalties has expired.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.7PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 5.7PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.3PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 4.4PT; TEXT-INDENT: 34.95PT">
	6.4&#160; &#160; &#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Accounting.&#160; &#160; &#160;&#160;
</FONT>
	LICENSEE&#160;&#160; will&#160;&#160; maintain&#160;&#160; records&#160;&#160; showing&#160;&#160; manufacture, importation,&#160; sale, and use of&#160; &#160; LICENSED&#160; PRODUCTS&#160; or performance&#160; of LICENSED SERVICES&#160; and the revenue received for seven (7) years from the date of sale of that LICENSED PRODUCT or LICENSED SERVICE. Records will include general-ledger records
</DIV>
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGEBREAKAREA" STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10PT; CLEAR: BOTH; MARGIN-TOP: 10PT">
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGENUMBERAREA" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 8PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	13
</DIV>
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGEBREAK" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: ALWAYS">
<HR STYLE="BORDER-LEFT-WIDTH: 0PX; HEIGHT: 2PX; BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: 0PX; BORDER-BOTTOM-WIDTH: 0PX; COLOR: #000000; CLEAR: BOTH; MARGIN: 4PX 0PX; BORDER-TOP-WIDTH: 0PX; WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000" NOSHADE="NOSHADE">
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage124"></A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 0PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 0PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.6PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 13PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 13PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 8.15PT; MARGIN-TOP: 1.55PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.35PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 2.75PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0.95PT">
	showing cash receipts and expenses, and records that include: production records, customers, invoices, serial numbers, and related information in sufficient detail to enable JHU to determine the royalties payable under this Agreement.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.65PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 8.15PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.3PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 4.05PT; TEXT-INDENT: 35.2PT">
	6.5&#160; &#160; &#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Audit&#160; by JHU.
</FONT>
	&#160;&#160; LICENSEE&#160; will allow&#160; JHU or its designee&#160; to examine LICENSEE's records at reasonable&#160; times and frequency at JHU's expense, to verify payments made by LICENSEE under this Agreement.&#160;&#160; If the audit reveals an under reporting of earned royalties due JHU of 5% or more for the period being audited, LICENSEE&#160; will pay the additional royalties due, and reimburse JHU the reasonable audit costs incurred.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.7PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN-LEFT: 8.35PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 6PT">
	7.&#160; &#160; &#160; &#160; WARRANTIES, EXCLUSIONS AND NEGATION
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.05PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 12PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 7.4PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.25PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 4.4PT; TEXT-INDENT: 35.45PT">
	7.1&#160; &#160; &#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	JHU&#160; Warranty.
</FONT>
	&#160; JHU represents that the Inventors listed have provided an invention disclosure to the JHU Office of Technology Transfer (JHTT), that the Inventors have assigned such rights as they have in the Inventions to JHU, and that JHU, as assignee of the Inventions, has filed the patent applications&#160; referred to in this Agreement.&#160; To the best of JHU's knowledge, information and belief, the LICENSED PATENT(S) accurately list the inventors of that patent right and JHU has received no claims of a third party to rights in the Licensed Patents other than as may be&#160; specifically stated in this Agreement.&#160;&#160; JHU does not warrant against presently unknown claims of third parties that may arise after this Agreement.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.75PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 6.95PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.3PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.25PT; TEXT-INDENT: 35.7PT">
	7.2&#160; &#160; &#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Negation&#160;&#160; of&#160; Warranties.
</FONT>
	&#160; &#160; JHU&#160; PROVIDES&#160; LICENSEE&#160;&#160; THE&#160; RIGHTS GRANTED IN THIS AGREEMENT AS IS AND WITH ALL FAULTS. JHU MAKES NO OTHER&#160; REPRESENTATIONS AND&#160; EXTENDS&#160; NO&#160; WARRANTIES&#160; OF ANY&#160; KIND, EITHER EXPRESS&#160; OR IMPLIED. AMONG&#160;&#160; OTHER THINGS, JHU DISCLAIMS ANY EXPRESS OR IMPLIED WARRANTY OF MERCHANTABILITY, OR FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.7PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">

<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 6.7PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.25PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.7PT; TEXT-INDENT: 35.45PT">
	7.3&#160; &#160;&#160;

LICENSEE agrees that no representation or statement by any JHU employee shall be deemed to be a statement or representation by JHU, and that LICENSEE was not induced to enter this Agreement based upon any statement or representation of JHU, or any employee of JHU. <FONT ID="TRGRRTFTOHTMLTAB" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 5.66PT">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;

<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	INDEMNITY AND INSURANCE
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.85PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 8.55PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.35PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 2.3PT; TEXT-INDENT: 35.5PT">
	8.1&#160;&#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Application.&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
	LICENSEE shall have exclusive control over the LICENSED PRODUCTS and LICENSED SERVICES&#160;&#160; provided by LICENSEE, and the risks and costs associated therewith.&#160; Therefore, LICENSEE will protect JHU INDEMNITEES from exposure to damages which arise from the actions of LICENSEE.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.7PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 8.1PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.3PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 2.25PT; TEXT-INDENT: 35.75PT">
	8.2&#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Indemnification.&#160; &#160; &#160; &#160;
</FONT>
	LICENSEE,&#160;&#160; AFFILIATED&#160; COMPANY&#160; and/or SUBLICENSEE agree that each shall be responsible for injuries or losses to third parties arising from or related to their own acts or omissions, or caused by or arising from LICENSED PRODUCTS or LICENSED SERVICES, or allegedly arising as a consequence of the exercise by LICENSEE, AFFILIATED COMPANY or SUBLICENSEE of any rights granted in this Agreement. To that end,&#160; LICENSEE, AFFILIATED COMPANY and SUBLICENSEE shall protect JHU INDEMNITEES from any third-party claims arising therefrom, including defending any action brought against JHU INDEMNITEES, with counsel reasonably acceptable to JHU, and indemnifying JHU INDEMNITEES as against any judgments, fees, expenses, or other costs arising from or incidental to any such lawsuit, claim, demand or other action, whether or not any JHU Indemnitee, is named as a party defendant in any such lawsuit and whether or not the JHU INDEMNITEES are alleged to be negligent or otherwise responsible for any injuries to persons or property. Exercise of the rights granted in this Agreement, by an AFFILIATED COMPANY or an agent or a SUBLICENSEE or a third party on behalf of or for the account of LICENSEE, shall be considered LICENSEE's practice of said inventions for purposes of this Paragraph.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.45PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 43.1PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF">
	8.3
</FONT>
<FONT ID="TRGRRTFTOHTMLTAB" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 5.48PT">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Exclusions.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.05PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 12PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 7.85PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.35PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 3.65PT; TEXT-INDENT: 69.35PT">
	8.3.1&#160;&#160; No indemnification will be provided for claims arising from the practice by a JHU Indemnitee of the PATENT RIGHTS, KNOW HOW or other TECHNOLOGY or exercise of rights retained by JHU under this Agreement.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.65PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 7.1PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.3PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 3.5PT; TEXT-INDENT: 70.1PT">
	8.3.2&#160;&#160; No indemnification will be provided for a claim against a JHU Indemnitee for injuries allegedly&#160; to the extent caused&#160;&#160; by negligent use or administration&#160; by a JHU Indemnitee of a LICENSED PRODUCT or LICENSED SERVICE, but any products liability or similar claim based upon a LICENSED PRODUCT or LICENSED SERVICE, made by or provided by LICENSEE or any AFFILIATED COMPANY or SUBLICENSEE will otherwise be covered by this indemnification requirement.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.5PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 7.1PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.35PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 4.1PT; TEXT-INDENT: 35.3PT">
	8.4&#160; &#160; &#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Survival&#160; after termination.&#160; &#160;
</FONT>
	The obligation of LICENSEE&#160; to defend and indemnify as set out in this Paragraph shall survive the termination of this Agreement, shall continue even after assignment of rights and responsibilities to an AFFILIATED COMPANY or SUBLICENSEE, and shall not be limited by any other limitation of liability elsewhere in this Agreement.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.45PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 6.9PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.35PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 4.9PT; TEXT-INDENT: 35.3PT">
	8.5&#160; &#160; &#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Rights and obligations of JHU.&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
	JHU shall provide LICENSEE with prompt notice of any claims covered&#160; by LICENSEE's obligation to indemnify, and will provide reasonable cooperation to LICENSEE in LICENSEE's investigation and defense of such claims. JHU shall have the right to participate in such defense with counsel of its choice and at JHU's own expense.&#160; JHU shall have the right to approve the settlement of any claim hereunder that
</DIV>
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGEBREAKAREA" STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10PT; CLEAR: BOTH; MARGIN-TOP: 10PT">
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGENUMBERAREA" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 8PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	15

	imposes any liability or obligation on JHU, or affects the PATENT RIGHTS, other than the payment of money damages paid by the LICENSEE.

<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 7.6PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.3PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 3.2PT; TEXT-INDENT: 35.7PT">
	8.6&#160; &#160; &#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Insurance.
</FONT>
	Prior to initial human testing or FIRST COMMERCIAL SALE of any LICENSED PRODUCT or LICENSED SERVICE, LICENSEE will establish and maintain Comprehensive&#160; General Liability&#160; Insurance,&#160; including&#160;&#160; Product Liability&#160; Insurance,&#160; with a reputable and financially secure insurance carrier acceptable to JHU to cover any liability of LICENSEE and JHU to&#160; third parties related to any LICENSED PRODUCT or LICENSED SERVICE,&#160; or&#160; otherwise&#160; arising&#160; from&#160; the&#160; activities&#160; of&#160; LICENSEE,&#160; any&#160; AFFILIATED COMPANY&#160; or SUBLICENSEE.&#160; The LICENSEE&#160; or the acquired&#160; insurance&#160; will provide minimum limits of liability of $5,000,000 per claim and will include all JHU INDEMNITEES as additional insureds. LICENSEE will furnish a Certificate of Insurance or other evidence of compliance upon reasonable request.&#160; All insurance of LICENSEE will be primary coverage; other insurance of JHU and JHU INDEMNITEES will be excess and noncontributory.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.7PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">

<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 7.6PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF">
	9.
</FONT>

<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF">

<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF">
	9.1
</FONT>
<FONT ID="TRGRRTFTOHTMLTAB" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 5.62PT">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">

</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.25PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 12PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 6.9PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.3PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 4.4PT; TEXT-INDENT: 69.9PT">
	9.1.1&#160;&#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Filing&#160; and&#160; Prosecution.
</FONT>
	&#160;&#160; JHU,&#160; at LICENSEE's expense,&#160; shall file, prosecute and maintain all patents and patent applications specified under PATENT RIGHTS. Title to all such patents and patent applications shall reside in JHU.&#160;&#160; JHU shall have final decision authority over all patent prosecution and maintenance matters. JHU shall (a) request its patent counsel to timely copy LICENSEE on all official actions and written correspondence with any patent office, including drafts of responses, (b) allow LICENSEE an opportunity to comment and advise JHU, and (c) consider in good faith comments and advice of LICENSEE and reasonably incorporate such comments into the filings and responses.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.45PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 6.4PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.3PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5PT; TEXT-INDENT: 69.9PT">
	9.1.2
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Responsibility of LICENSEE.
</FONT>
	LICENSEE shall be responsible for exercising its right to comment&#160; and advise JHU with respect to patent prosecution&#160; and maintenance matters, including assuring timely review of patents drafted or filed, timely filing as necessary and payment of required costs.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.7PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 5.45PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.3PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 6.15PT; TEXT-INDENT: 70.4PT">
	9.1.3&#160;&#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Election&#160; not to file in certain jurisdictions.
</FONT>
	&#160; By concurrent written notification to JHU and its patent counsel at least thirty (30) days in advance (or later at JHU's discretion) of any filing or response deadline, or fee due date, LICENSEE may elect not to have a&#160; patent application filed in&#160; any particular country or not to pay expenses associated with prosecuting or maintaining any patent application or patent, provided that LICENSEE pays for all costs incurred up to JHU's receipt of such notification.&#160; Failure to provide such notification will be considered by JHU to be LICENSEE's authorization to proceed at LICENSEE's expense. Upon such notification, JHU may file, prosecute, and/or maintain such patent applications or patent at its own expense and for its own&#160; benefit, and any rights or license granted hereunder held&#160;&#160; by LICENSEE,&#160; AFFILIATED&#160; COMPANIES&#160; or SUBLICENSEE(S) relating&#160; to the PATENT RIGHTS which comprise the subject of such patent applications or patent and/or apply to the particular country, shall terminate, and thereafter reside solely in JHU.
</DIV>
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGEBREAKAREA" STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10PT; CLEAR: BOTH; MARGIN-TOP: 10PT">
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGENUMBERAREA" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 8PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	16
</DIV>
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGEBREAK" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: ALWAYS">
<HR STYLE="BORDER-LEFT-WIDTH: 0PX; HEIGHT: 2PX; BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: 0PX; BORDER-BOTTOM-WIDTH: 0PX; COLOR: #000000; CLEAR: BOTH; MARGIN: 4PX 0PX; BORDER-TOP-WIDTH: 0PX; WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000" NOSHADE="NOSHADE">

<A NAME="eolPage127"></A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 0PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 0PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.35PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 6.85PT; MARGIN-TOP: 1.55PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.35PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 2.2PT; TEXT-INDENT: 70.1PT">
	9.1.4&#160;&#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Orange Book Listings.&#160; &#160;
</FONT>
	At least fifteen (15) business days prior to expiration&#160; of the time period under 21 C.F.R. 314.53&#160; for submitting&#160; patent information pertaining to LICENSED PATENT with respect to a LICENSED PRODUCT or LICENSED SERVICE, LICENSEE shall submit to JHU any such draft submission, including any forms such as Form FDA 3542, Form FDA 3542a or any equivalent thereof, for JHU's review and comment. LICENSEE shall consider in good faith any comments made by JHU. In the event that the parties' respective patent counsel, after good faith discussions, cannot agree with respect to any decision to be made under this Paragraph then LICENSEE shall make such decision.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.45PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 6.35PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.35PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 2.85PT; TEXT-INDENT: 70.3PT">
	9.1.5&#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Application for Patent Term Extension.&#160;
</FONT>
	The parties shall cooperate in obtaining patent term extensions.&#160; At least fifteen (15)&#160; business days prior to the expiration of any statutory or other regulatory time period in the Territory for submitting an application for patent term extension pertaining to any of the PATENT RIGHTS included in the LICENSED PATENT rights, including applications for interim extension and SPC in the U.S. or in a foreign country in the Territory, LICENSEE shall submit to JHU a draft application therefor for JHU's review and comment.&#160;&#160; LICENSEE shall consider in good faith any comments made by JHU pursuant to this Paragraph. In the event that the parties cannot agree with respect to any decision to be made under this Paragraph, including the patent to apply for extension, then LICENSEE shall make such decision.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.45PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 6.35PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.25PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 3.65PT; TEXT-INDENT: 35.05PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF">
	9.2
</FONT>
<FONT ID="TRGRRTFTOHTMLTAB" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 5.6PT">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Notification of Infringement
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	third party.&#160;
</FONT>
	Each party will notify the other promptly in writing when any infringement by any third party is uncovered or suspected.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.8PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 41.4PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF">
	9.3
</FONT>
<FONT ID="TRGRRTFTOHTMLTAB" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 5.77PT">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Suit for Infringement.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.05PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 12PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 5.65PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.35PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 3.05PT; TEXT-INDENT: 70.3PT">
	9.3.1&#160;&#160; LICENSEE shall have the first right to enforce the PATENT RIGHTS against any infringement or alleged infringement thereof, and shall at all times keep JHU informed as to the status thereof. This right to sue for infringement shall not be used in an arbitrary or capricious manner. Before LICENSEE commences an action with respect to any infringement of such patents, LICENSEE&#160; shall give careful consideration to the views of JHU and to potential effects on the public interest in making its decision whether or&#160; not to sue. Thereafter, LICENSEE may, at its own expense and discretion, institute suit against any such infringer or alleged infringer and control and defend such suit in a manner consistent with the terms and provisions hereof.&#160;&#160; JHU agrees to be named as nominal third party plaintiff if necessary to the commencement of any such suit and to cooperate fully with LICENSEE in connection therewith.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.2PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 5.65PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.55PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 4.4PT; TEXT-INDENT: 69.85PT">
	9.3.2&#160;&#160; No settlement, consent judgment or other voluntary final disposition of the suit may be concluded without the prior written consent of JHU, which consent shall not be unreasonably withheld.&#160; JHU shall reasonably cooperate in any such litigation at LICENSEE's expense.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.8PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 10PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 10PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 5.4PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.4PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 4.5PT; TEXT-INDENT: 69.85PT">
	9.3.3&#160;&#160; If LICENSEE elects not to enforce any patent within the PATENT RIGHTS, it shall so notify JHU promptly in writing and JHU may, in its sole judgment and at its own expense, take steps to enforce any patent and control, settle, and defend such suit in a manner consistent with the terms and provisions hereof, and recover, for its own account, any damages, awards or settlements resulting therefrom.
</DIV>
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGEBREAKAREA" STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10PT; CLEAR: BOTH; MARGIN-TOP: 10PT">
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGENUMBERAREA" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 8PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	17
</DIV>
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGEBREAK" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: ALWAYS">
<HR STYLE="BORDER-LEFT-WIDTH: 0PX; HEIGHT: 2PX; BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: 0PX; BORDER-BOTTOM-WIDTH: 0PX; COLOR: #000000; CLEAR: BOTH; MARGIN: 4PX 0PX; BORDER-TOP-WIDTH: 0PX; WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000" NOSHADE="NOSHADE">
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage128"></A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 0PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 0PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.05PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 12PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 8.3PT; MARGIN-TOP: 1.55PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.35PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 2.15PT; TEXT-INDENT: 34.8PT">
	9.4&#160; &#160; &#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Patent Invalidity Suit.
</FONT>
	&#160; &#160; LICENSEE shall have the first right (but not the obligation) to defend at LICENSEE's expense a declaratory judgment or other action brought by a third party naming LICENSEE or JHU as a defendant and alleging invalidity of any of the PATENT RIGHTS in which case JHU shall cooperate fully with LICENSEE.&#160;&#160; If LICENSEE opts not to defend, JHU in its discretion may elect to take over the sole defense of the action at its own expense, in which case LICENSEE shall cooperate fully with JHU in connection with any such action.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.7PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 8.1PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.25PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 2.85PT; TEXT-INDENT: 34.55PT">
	9.5&#160; &#160; &#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Recovery.
</FONT>
	LICENSEE shall pay to JHU fifteen&#160; percent (15%) of any monetary award, settlement or recovery, net of all reasonable attorneys' fees and out-of-pocket costs and expenses paid to third parties by LICENSEE in connection with each suit or settlement.&#160; If the cost and expenses exceed the recovery no additional amount shall be paid to JHU.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.3PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 8.3PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	10.
</FONT>
<FONT ID="TRGRRTFTOHTMLTAB" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 5.62PT">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	HANDLING AND RESOLUTION OF DISPUTES.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.95PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 7.1PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.35PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 3.15PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36.25PT">
	10.1&#160; &#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Governing Law.
</FONT>
	This Agreement shall be construed, and legal relations between the parties hereto shall be determined, in accordance with the laws of the State of Delaware applicable to contracts executed and wholly to be performed within the State of Delaware without giving effect to the principles of conflicts of laws. Any disputes between the parties to this Agreement including the applicability or validity of any PATENT RIGHTS, shall be brought in the state or federal courts located in Wilmington, Delaware.&#160; Both parties agree to waive their right to a jury trial and to consent to jurisdiction in such courts.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.45PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 6.9PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.3PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 4.1PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT">
	10.2&#160; &#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Resolution.
</FONT>
	&#160; The parties shall attempt to resolve all disputes through informal means. This may include mediation, arbitration, or any other procedures upon which the parties agree.&#160; Each party agrees that, prior to resorting to litigation, it will confer with other party to determine whether other procedures that are less expensive or less time consuming can be adopted to resolve the dispute.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.95PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 6.4PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.25PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 4PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT">
	10.3&#160;&#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Challenges to PATENT RIGHTS, Scope and Applicability - requirements during and after challenge of PATENT RIGHTS by LICENSEE.
</FONT>
	LICENSEE shall ensure that the terms of this Paragraph 10.3 and its sub-paragraphs are included in any SUBLICENSE. If LICENSEE, AFFILIATED COMPANY or SUBLICENSEE brings formal legal action before a court or governmental authority of competent jurisdiction against JHU challenging the validity or scope of the PATENT RIGHTS, or applicability of the PATENT RIGHTS to a LICENSED PRODUCT or LICENSED SERVICE the following shall apply.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.8PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 5.9PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.35PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 3.9PT; TEXT-INDENT: 70.8PT">
	10.3.1 Actions by a SUBLICENSEE shall be attributed to LICENSEE only if the action&#160; was taken at the direction of or written consent of LICENSEE.&#160; In all other cases, the provisions of this Paragraph 10.3 shall not apply to SUBLICENSEE, notwithstanding the terms hereof.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.7PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 5.45PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.3PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 4.35PT; TEXT-INDENT: 70.8PT">
	10.3.2 If such action determines&#160; that at least one claim of a patent challenged by LICENSEE, AFFILIATE or SUBLICENSEE is valid and, if applicable, but for this Agreement, infringed by a LICENSED PRODUCT or LICENSED SERVICE, the party challenging will thereafter, except as to PATENT COSTS, pay twice the payment amount which would otherwise be required to be paid under the original LICENSE or SUBLICENSE.&#160;&#160; For clarity, this shall
</DIV>
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGEBREAKAREA" STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10PT; CLEAR: BOTH; MARGIN-TOP: 10PT">
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGENUMBERAREA" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 8PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	18
</DIV>
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGEBREAK" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: ALWAYS">
<HR STYLE="BORDER-LEFT-WIDTH: 0PX; HEIGHT: 2PX; BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: 0PX; BORDER-BOTTOM-WIDTH: 0PX; COLOR: #000000; CLEAR: BOTH; MARGIN: 4PX 0PX; BORDER-TOP-WIDTH: 0PX; WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000" NOSHADE="NOSHADE">
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage129"></A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 0PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 0PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.25PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 13PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 13PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 9.05PT; MARGIN-TOP: 1.55PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.25PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 2.6PT; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25PT">
	apply to MAR's,&#160; Milestones,&#160; Sublicensing&#160; fees, royalty rates and other payments, except incurred PATENT COSTS which will be paid as otherwise agreed.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.8PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 8.3PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.3PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 3.8PT; TEXT-INDENT: 71.05PT">
	10.3.3 If such action determines&#160; that at least one claim of a patent challenged by LICENSEE, AFFILIATED COMPANY or SUBLICENSEE is valid and, if applicable, but for this&#160; Agreement,&#160; infringed&#160; by&#160; a LICENSED&#160; PRODUCT&#160; or&#160;&#160; LICENSED&#160; SERVICE,&#160; the LICENSEE, AFFILIATED COMPANY or SUBLICENSEE challenging will pay all reasonable attorneys' fees and litigation costs, including expert witness fees and exhibit preparation costs incurred by JHU in defending the challenge.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.75PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 7.6PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.3PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 3.45PT; TEXT-INDENT: 71.05PT">
	10.3.4 During the course of such challenge, all payments otherwise required by this Agreement shall be paid as and when due, to the same extent as if there were no challenge to the PATENT RIGHTS, and LICENSEE, AFFILIATED COMPANY or SUBLICENSEE will have no right to recoup any payments, including royalties, which become due before or during the challenge.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.5PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 7.1PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.35PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 4.35PT; TEXT-INDENT: 71.3PT">
	10.3.5 LICENSEE, AFFILIATED COMPANY or SUBLICENSEE shall not pay royalties into any escrow or other similar account, but shall make all payments to JHU as due and when due, unless LICENSEE or SUBLICENSEE has prior to the payment becoming due, voluntarily and completely terminated this Agreement.&#160; Timely and complete payment and full compliance by LICENSEE, AFFILIATED COMPANY and SUBLICENSEE with all terms of this Agreement shall be a condition precedent to bringing and maintaining the legal action challenging the PATENT RIGHTS.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.45PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 6.65PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.35PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 4.8PT; TEXT-INDENT: 71.05PT">
	10.3.6 No less than three months prior to bringing an action seeking to invalidate or limit a LICENSED PATENT, LICENSEE, AFFILIATED COMPANY or SUBLICENSEE will provide written notice of the expected challenge to JHU which shall include a clear statement of the factual and legal basis for the challenge, and an identification of all prior art and other matter believed to invalidate any claim of the LICENSED PATENT or which supports the claim&#160; that the LICENSED&#160; PATENT&#160; does&#160; not apply&#160; to the LICENSED&#160; PRODUCT&#160; or LICENSED SERVICE.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.7PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 7.1PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	11.
</FONT>
<FONT ID="TRGRRTFTOHTMLTAB" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 5.65PT">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	TERM AND TERMINATION
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.05PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 12PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 5.7PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.3PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.7PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36.95PT">
	11.1&#160;&#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Term.
</FONT>
	The term of this Agreement shall commence on the EFFECTIVE DATE and shall continue, in each country in the LICENSED TERRITORY, until the date of expiration of the last to expire patent included within PATENT RIGHTS in that country or if no patents issue then for a term often (10) years from the FIRST COMMERCIAL SALE in such country of this Agreement. Following expiration of this Agreement, on a country-by-country basis, all non- exclusive license grants hereunder shall be fully-paid up, sublicensable, assignable, irrevocable and perpetual; provided that LICENSEE and any sublicensee or assignee shall remain bound by the terms and conditions of Sections 7, 8.1-8.5, 12.2, 12.3, 12.4, 12.5 and 12.7 of this Agreement with respect to such non-exclusive licenses.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.75PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 5.7PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.35PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 7.35PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36.25PT">
	11.2&#160; &#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Termination by LICENSEE.&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
	LICENSEE may terminate this Agreement in whole or in part&#160; by giving JHU written notice at least&#160; 90 days in&#160; advance of the proposed effective date of termination selected by LICENSEE. LICENSEE shall pay all sums due under
</DIV>
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGEBREAKAREA" STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10PT; CLEAR: BOTH; MARGIN-TOP: 10PT">
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGENUMBERAREA" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 8PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	19
</DIV>
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGEBREAK" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: ALWAYS">
<HR STYLE="BORDER-LEFT-WIDTH: 0PX; HEIGHT: 2PX; BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: 0PX; BORDER-BOTTOM-WIDTH: 0PX; COLOR: #000000; CLEAR: BOTH; MARGIN: 4PX 0PX; BORDER-TOP-WIDTH: 0PX; WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000" NOSHADE="NOSHADE">
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage130"></A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 0PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 0PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.3PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 12PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 9.75PT; MARGIN-TOP: 1.55PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.35PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 2.75PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0.7PT">
	this Agreement, including Minimum Annual Royalties, earned royalties, Milestone payments or PATENT COSTS which are incurred or are or become due prior to the effective date of termination.&#160; In addition, LICENSEE shall also be obligated to pay any PATENT COSTS which are required to be incurred to preserve the patent prior to the effective date of termination, and any other costs which JHU has incurred or will incur prior to the termination date which under this Agreement are required to be reimbursed by LICENSEE.&#160; Termination is not effective and payments shall continue to accrue and become due until all amounts due to JHU shall have been paid.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.45PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 26.7PT">

</TD>

	11.3
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Termination by JHU.
</FONT>
	JHU may terminate this Agreement if LICENSEE:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 79.6PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 26.7PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 8PT; TEXT-INDENT: 1.4PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF">
	(i)
</FONT>
<FONT ID="TRGRRTFTOHTMLTAB" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 5.5PT">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF">
	is delinquent on any report, payment or other obligation;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 113.9PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0.45PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.55PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 3.3PT; TEXT-INDENT: -34.55PT">
	(ii)&#160; &#160; is not using commercially reasonable efforts to diligently develop and commercialize LICENSED PRODUCT in accordance with Paragraph 4.2;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.3PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 79.1PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF">
	(iii)
</FONT>
<FONT ID="TRGRRTFTOHTMLTAB" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 5.65PT">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF">
	misses a milestone that has a required date for completion described in
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 113.7PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0.55PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
	Exhibit A;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.3PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 12PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 113.7PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.25PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 4.25PT; TEXT-INDENT: -34.55PT">
	(iv)&#160; &#160;&#160; is in material breach of any provision of this Agreement or of any related agreement including a related sponsored research agreement;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.8PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 78.9PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF">
	(v)
</FONT>
<FONT ID="TRGRRTFTOHTMLTAB" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 5.68PT">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF">
	provides any false report; or
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 9.3PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0.2PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 24.5PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 4.9PT; TEXT-INDENT: 69.6PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF">
	(vi)
</FONT>
<FONT ID="TRGRRTFTOHTMLTAB" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 5.68PT">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF">
	voluntarily or involuntarily enters bankruptcy or receivership proceedings. Termination under this Paragraph will take effect 30 days&#160; after written notice by JHU unless
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 9.05PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0.55PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.35PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 4.9PT">
	LICENSEE cures the default within that 30-day period. If LICENSEE has had no prior defaults, and LICENSEE is diligently and in good faith attempting to cure the default, LICENSEE may request, and JHU shall grant an additional 60 days to cure the default.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.45PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 9.05PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.35PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 4.45PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT">
	11.4&#160; &#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Failure to meet a required diligence milestone.
</FONT>
	If this Agreement provides for diligence milestones which must be accomplished by specified dates or within specified periods of time, LICENSEE may cure any default for failure to meet a required diligence milestone in accordance with this subsection.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.7PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 112.5PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.25PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.05PT; TEXT-INDENT: -34.3PT">
	(i)&#160; &#160; &#160;&#160; LICENSEE must be using commercially reasonable efforts to diligently pursue the milestone;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.55PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 112.5PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.35PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 4.6PT; TEXT-INDENT: -34.3PT">
	(ii)&#160; &#160; &#160; LICENSEE can cure such default, by paying $1 0,000 within the 30-day cure period, which will automatically extend the milestone date (and the full amount of the original&#160; milestone&#160; payment)&#160; and any subsequent milestones relying&#160; upon the meeting of the missed milestone for an additional six (6) months.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.45PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 77.7PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF">
	(iii)
</FONT>
<FONT ID="TRGRRTFTOHTMLTAB" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 5.72PT">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF">
	Such a cure may be made no more than twice as to any one milestone.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.85PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN-LEFT: 8.8PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.1PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 8PT">
	12.&#160; &#160;&#160; MISCELLANEOUS PROVISIONS.
</DIV>
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGEBREAKAREA" STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10PT; CLEAR: BOTH; MARGIN-TOP: 10PT">
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGENUMBERAREA" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 8PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	20
</DIV>
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGEBREAK" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: ALWAYS">
<HR STYLE="BORDER-LEFT-WIDTH: 0PX; HEIGHT: 2PX; BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: 0PX; BORDER-BOTTOM-WIDTH: 0PX; COLOR: #000000; CLEAR: BOTH; MARGIN: 4PX 0PX; BORDER-TOP-WIDTH: 0PX; WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000" NOSHADE="NOSHADE">
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage131"></A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 0PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 0PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.05PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 13PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 13PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 8.3PT; MARGIN-TOP: 1.55PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.4PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 2.2PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36.25PT">
	12.1&#160; &#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	PATENT MARKING.
</FONT>
	&#160; LICENSEE agrees that all LICENSED PRODUCT(S) sold by LICENSEE, AFFILIATED COMPANIES and SUBLICENSEE(S) of LICENSEE will be marked with the number of the applicable patent(s) licensed hereunder in accordance with each country's patent laws.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.4PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 7.85PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.3PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 2.65PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36.5PT">
	12.2&#160; &#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Use of Name.
</FONT>
	LICENSEE, AFFILIATED COMPANIES and SUBLICENSEE(S) shall not use the name of The Johns Hopkins University or The Johns Hopkins Health System or any of its constituent parts, such as the Johns Hopkins Hospital, Johns Hopkins Medicine or any contraction thereof or the name of Inventors in any advertising, promotional literature, Web sites, electronic media applications, sales literature, fundraising documents, or press releases and other print&#160; or electronic communications without prior written consent from an authorized representative of JHU. LICENSEE, AFFILIATED COMPANIES and SUBLICENSEE(S) shall allow at least seven (7) business days' notice of any proposed public disclosure for JHU's review and comment or to provide written consent. Such request shall be made through JHTT.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.75PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 7.35PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.35PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 3.25PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36.5PT">
	12.3&#160; &#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	No Partnership.
</FONT>
	Nothing in this Agreement shall be construed to create any agency, employment, partnership, joint venture or similar relationship between the parties other than that of a licensor/licensee.&#160; Neither party shall have any right or authority whatsoever to incur any liability or obligation (express or implied) or otherwise act in any manner in the name or on the behalf of the other, or to make any promise, warranty or representation binding on the other.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.45PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 6.9PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.35PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 4.4PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36.25PT">
	12.4&#160; &#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Notice of Claim.
</FONT>
	&#160;&#160; Each party shall give the other or its representative immediate notice of any suit or action filed, or prompt notice of any claim made, against them arising out of the performance of this Agreement or arising out of the practice of the inventions licensed hereunder.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.7PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 43.1PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF">
	12.5
</FONT>
<FONT ID="TRGRRTFTOHTMLTAB" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 5.48PT">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	ASSIGNMENT.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.85PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 6.4PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.35PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 4PT; TEXT-INDENT: 71.05PT">
	12.5.1
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Permitted Assignment by LICENSEE.
</FONT>
	Subject to this Paragraph 12.5, LICENSEE may assign this Agreement as part of a sale, merger or other transfer with respect to the line of business of LICENSEE to which this Agreement relates, regardless of whether such a sale occurs through an asset sale, stock sale, merger or other combination if the sale or merger is of LICENSEE's entire business related to the PATENT RIGHTS.&#160; Any other attempt to assign this Agreement by LICENSEE is null and void in the absence of JHU's written permission.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.45PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 6.65PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.55PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.05PT; TEXT-INDENT: 70.55PT">
	12.5.2
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Conditions of Assignment.
</FONT>
	&#160;&#160; Prior to any assignment,&#160; the following conditions must be met:
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.3PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.25PT">
<TABLE ID="A7DDFDAA0167491C913D9577267F5904" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">

</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 34PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(i)

	LICENSEE must give JHU 30 days prior written notice of the assignment, including the new assignee's contact information; and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.8PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 75.75PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF">
	(ii)
</FONT>

	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;

<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF">
	the new assignee must agree in writing to JHU to be bound by this
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 109.85PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0.55PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
	Agreement.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.3PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 12PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 5.9PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.25PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.45PT; TEXT-INDENT: 71.05PT">
	12.5.3
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Assignment Payment to JHU.
</FONT>
	&#160; Where the assignment is the result of complete sale or merger of LICENSEE, then LICENSEE (or its assignee) shall pay to JHU an assignment fee described in Exhibit A. For the avoidance of doubt, all assignees of LICENSEE
</DIV>
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGEBREAKAREA" STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10PT; CLEAR: BOTH; MARGIN-TOP: 10PT">
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGENUMBERAREA" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 8PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">

</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage132"></A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 0PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 0PT">

</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 9.3PT; MARGIN-TOP: 1.55PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.55PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 2.65PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0.25PT">
	shall be subject to the terms and conditions of this Agreement (including with respect to royalty and milestone payments) as if the assignee was "LICENSEE" hereunder.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.3PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 8.8PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.35PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 2.25PT; TEXT-INDENT: 70.3PT">
	12.5.4
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	After the Assignment.
</FONT>
	Upon a permitted complete assignment of this Agreement, LICENSEE will be released from further obligations under this Agreement, except for those sections that survive termination, and the term "LICENSEE" in this Agreement will thereafter mean the assignee.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.7PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 8.3PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.3PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 2.2PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36.25PT">
	12.6&#160; &#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Notice.
</FONT>
	&#160; &#160; &#160; Except&#160; for&#160; those&#160; communications&#160;&#160; which&#160; specifically&#160; under&#160; this Agreement may be sent via e-mail or other electronic communication (such as notification of PATENT COSTS incurred and due, and other routine communications), all notices, requests or communications required or permitted to be given by either party hereunder shall be given by registered mail or certified mail, return receipt requested, or sent by overnight courier, such as Federal Express, to the other party at its respective address set forth below or to such other address as one party shall give notice of to the other from time to time hereunder. Notices shall be deemed effective when received.
</DIV>
