<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 7.35PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.4PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 4.15PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36.25PT">
	12.7&#160;&#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Compliance with&#160; All Laws.
</FONT>
	&#160; &#160;&#160; In all activities&#160; undertaken&#160; pursuant to this Agreement, both JHU and LICENSEE covenant and agree that each will in all material respects comply with such Federal, state and local laws and statutes, as may be in effect at the time of performance and all valid rules, regulations and orders thereof regulating such activities.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.4PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 6.9PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.3PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 4.45PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36.25PT">
	12.8&#160;&#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Successors and Assigns.
</FONT>
	&#160; Other than as specifically stated herein, neither this Agreement nor any of the rights or obligations created herein, except for the right to receive any remuneration hereunder, may be assigned by either party, in whole or in part, without the prior written consent of the other party.&#160; This Agreement shall bind and inure to the benefit of the successors and permitted assigns of the parties hereto.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.75PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 6.65PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.3PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 4.6PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36.25PT">
	12.9&#160;&#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	No Waivers; Severability.
</FONT>
	&#160; No waiver of any breach of this Agreement shall constitute a waiver of any other breach of the same or other provision of this Agreement, and no waiver shall be effective unless made in writing and signed by the party waiving. Any provision hereof prohibited by or unenforceable under any applicable law of any jurisdiction shall as to such jurisdiction&#160; be deemed&#160; ineffective&#160; and deleted herefrom without affecting any other
</DIV>
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGEBREAKAREA" STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10PT; CLEAR: BOTH; MARGIN-TOP: 10PT">
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGENUMBERAREA" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 8PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	22
</DIV>
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGEBREAK" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: ALWAYS">

	provision of this Agreement.
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF">
	It
</FONT>
	is the desire of the parties hereto that this Agreement be enforced to the maximum extent permitted by law, and should any provision contained herein be held by any&#160; governmental&#160;&#160; agency&#160; or&#160; court&#160; of&#160; competent&#160; jurisdiction&#160; to&#160; be&#160; void,&#160; illegal&#160; and unenforceable, the parties shall negotiate in good faith for a substitute term or provision which carries out the original intent of the parties.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.75PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 7.85PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.3PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 2.7PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36.7PT">
	12.10&#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Entire Agreement; Amendment.
</FONT>
	LICENSEE and JHU acknowledge that they have read this entire Agreement and that this Agreement,&#160; including the attached Exhibits, constitutes the entire understanding and contract between the parties hereto and supersedes any and all prior or contemporaneous oral or written communications with respect to the subject matter hereof, all of which communications are merged herein.&#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF">
	It
</FONT>
	is expressly understood and agreed that: (i) there being no expectations to the contrary between the parties hereto, no usage of trade, verbal agreement or another regular practice or method dealing within any industry or between the parties hereto shall be used to modify, interpret, supplement or alter in any manner the express terms of this Agreement; and (ii) this Agreement shall not be modified, amended or in any way altered except by an instrument in writing signed by both of the parties hereto.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.75PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 7.85PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.25PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 4.3PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT">
	12.11&#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Binding Agreement.
</FONT>
	Exchange of this Agreement in draft or final form between the parties shall not be considered a binding offer, and this Agreement shall not be deemed final or binding on either party until the final Agreement has been signed by both parties.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.55PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 7.1PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.35PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 4.6PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36.7PT">
	12.12&#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Delays or Omissions.
</FONT>
	Except as expressly provided herein, no delay or omission to exercise any right, power or remedy accruing to any party hereto, shall impair any such right, power or remedy&#160; to such party nor shall it be construed to be a waiver of any such breach or default, or an acquiescence therein, or in any similar breach or default be deemed a waiver of any other breach or default theretofore or thereafter occurring.&#160;&#160; Any waiver, permit, consent or approval of any kind or character on the part of any party of any breach or default under this Agreement, or any waiver on the part of any party of any provisions or conditions of this Agreement, must be in writing and shall be effective only to the extent specifically set forth in such writing.&#160; All remedies either under this Agreement or by law or otherwise afforded to any party, shall be cumulative and not alternative.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.7PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 6.65PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.25PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 4.3PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36.5PT">
	12.13&#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Survival.
</FONT>
	All representations, warranties, covenants and agreements made herein and which by their express terms or by implication are to be performed or continue to apply after the execution&#160; and/or termination&#160; hereof, or are prospective&#160; in nature, shall survive such execution and/or termination, as the case may be. In addition, the following shall explicitly and specifically survive any termination or expiration:
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 110.1PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.25PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.7PT; TEXT-INDENT: -33.85PT">
	(i)&#160; &#160; &#160;&#160; LICENSEE's obligation to make payments to JHU, accrued or accruable during&#160; the term of this Agreement, including earned royalties, sublicensing&#160;&#160; payments,&#160;&#160; reimbursement&#160;&#160; of&#160; PATENT&#160;&#160; COSTS,&#160;&#160; late payments and interest;

<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>

	(ii)&#160; &#160; &#160; any claim of LICENSEE or JHU, accrued or to accrue, because of any breach or default by the other party; and

<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.25PT">
<TABLE ID="3B7BD53CA3CB4A87BECEE24C310F8E5D" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 9.5PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 32.5PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	1.
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Patents and Inventors:
</FONT>
	The patents and patent applications listed below and claiming priority from and including US Provisional Applications&#160;[*] and [*], and PCT application [*], entitled "PSMA-binding agents and uses thereof;"

<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Unreimbursed Patent Costs
</FONT>
	: As of July 17, 2015, unreimbursed PATENT COSTS incurred prior to the EFFECTIVE DATE ("Past Patent Expenses") are approximately $135,572. Company will reimburse JHU for such Past Patent Expenses in twelve (12) equal quarterly installments. With respect to PATENT COSTS incurred on or after the EFFECTIVE DATE, Company shall reimburse JHU within thirty (30) days of receipt of an invoice from JHU.

</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Right of First Negotiation
</FONT>
	for Additional Fields of Use: In the event that JHU desires to grant a license of all or any part of the PATENT RIGHTS to a third party for any field of use outside the LICENSED FIELD of USE, JHU shall first offer such license for such
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGEBREAKAREA" STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10PT; CLEAR: BOTH; MARGIN-TOP: 10PT">
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGENUMBERAREA" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 8PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	25
</DIV>
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGEBREAK" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: ALWAYS">
<HR STYLE="BORDER-LEFT-WIDTH: 0PX; HEIGHT: 2PX; BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: 0PX; BORDER-BOTTOM-WIDTH: 0PX; COLOR: #000000; CLEAR: BOTH; MARGIN: 4PX 0PX; BORDER-TOP-WIDTH: 0PX; WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000" NOSHADE="NOSHADE">
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage136"></A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 0PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 0PT">

<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.55PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 12PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 43.1PT; MARGIN-TOP: 1.55PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.35PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 2.4PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5PT">
	field of use to LICENSEE. LICENSEE shall have ninety (90) days to determine whether to accept and acquire such license whereupon LICENSEE shall notify JHU of its determination. In the event that LICENSEE elects not to acquire the license, JHU shall be free to grant the license to a third party. In the event that LICENSEE elects to acquire such license, the parties agree to negotiate in good faith the terms of such license which terms shall not differ materially from those contained herein. In the event that the parties do not enter into a written agreement for such license within ninety (90) days, JHU shall be free to grant the license to a third party.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 43.1PT; MARGIN-TOP: 1.55PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.35PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 2.4PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5PT">
	&#160;

<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Milestone payments.
</FONT>
	Upon the completion of diligence milestones by LICENSEE, an AFFILIATED&#160; COMPANY&#160; or SUBLICENSEE&#160; per Paragraph 5.4, LICENSEE shall remit payment to JHU as indicated below.&#160; In the event that a Phase I and/or Phase II clinical trial is conducted at JHU, LICENSEE is excused from making the accrued related milestone payment to JHU until the milestone for the Phase III clinical trial is met. Under such circumstance, LICENSEE agrees that it will pay the accrued Phase I and Phase II milestone payments when it submits Phase III milestone payment to JHU. Milestones&#160; shall&#160;&#160; by payable&#160; only once,&#160; regardless&#160; of the number&#160; of&#160; LICENSED PRODUCTS or LICENSED SERVICES advanced through development.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>

	c.
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	Dosing of the first patient in a Confirmatory Phase II Clinical Trial within two (2) years of the EFFECTIVE DATE, where "Confirmatory Phase II Clinical Trial" means at least 35 patients intending to serve as support for a subsequent Phase III study.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>

	within three (3) years of the EFFECTIVE DATE.

</TD>

	11.1
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	If the SUBLICENSE is granted on or before the two (2) year anniversary of this Agreement, and if at that time, LICENSEE has invested less than $4,000,000 in developing LICENSED PRODUCTS or LICENSED SERVICES which are the subject of the SUBLICENSE, LICENSEE shall pay to JHU 35% of all SUBLICENSING INCOME.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>

<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.25PT">
<TABLE ID="72DF3447F75149CBA7A3A42E289182BC" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">

	If the SUBLICENSE is granted more than two (2) years after the date of this Agreement or after LICENSEE has invested $4,000,000, LICENSEE shall pay to JHU 20% of all SUBLICENSING INCOME.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>

<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.3PT">
<TABLE ID="3BAE1249BFD44B43A79F06AAA5C52437" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">

<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 44.05PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 57PX; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	11.3
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	Multiple technologies included in SUBLICENSE. Where multiple technologies or licenses in addition to the licensed TECHNOLOGY are included on one SUBLICENSE, where the amount attributed to each is not specifically stated in the SUBLICENSE, the amount attributable to each shall be deemed to apply equally to each technology or license that is included in the SUBLICENSE. Where reasonable to do so, LICENSEE may request another application of the SUBLICENSING INCOME, by providing a written request and analysis to JHTT of the basis for LICENSEE's request, but in no circumstance shall less than 10% of the SUBLICENSING INCOME be applied to the TECHNOLOGY licensed by this Agreement.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>

<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.4PT">

</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.05PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 13PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 13PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; MARGIN-LEFT: 204.25PT; MARGIN-TOP: 1.55PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 199PT">
	EXHIBIT D
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; MARGIN-TOP: 1PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 1.5PT">
	GLOBAL ACCESS FOR ESSENTIAL MEDICINES
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.8PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 12PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 9.3PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.25PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 25.15PT; TEXT-INDENT: 34.8PT">
	The following terms, conditions, rights and duties shall be deemed to be a part of the License Agreement and shall be included therein, and shall be in addition to any terms in the Agreement.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.2PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 14PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN-LEFT: 10.5PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF">
	1.
</FONT>
<FONT ID="TRGRRTFTOHTMLTAB" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 5.42PT">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	DEFINITIONS
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.05PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 12PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.35PT">
<TABLE ID="E106CE77F23E40A7A5880C225C4FED2E" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 44.8PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 33.2PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	1.1
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	GAVI COUNTRY
</FONT>
	shall mean any country listed as eligible to receive support from the GAVI Alliance (formerly known as the Global Alliance for Vaccines and Immunization), as such list may be updated from to time by the GAVI Alliance.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.45PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.3PT">
<TABLE ID="9A493F2FA5084FEDAC98FB52934383E4" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 44.55PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 32.45PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	1.2
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	HUMANITARIAN PURPOSES
</FONT>
	shall mean practice of PATENT RIGHTS in the prevention or treatment of disease in humans by or on behalf of any Qualified Humanitarian Organization (including, for clarity, practice of PATENT RIGHTS by contractors, manufactures or distributors acting for or on behalf of such Qualified Humanitarian Organizations on a fee-for-service, fee-for-product or charitable basis): (a) to manufacture LICENSED PRODUCTS anywhere in the world for the sole and express purposes of distribution and use of such LICENSED PRODUCTS in one or more GAVI Countries, and (b) to sell or otherwise distribute LICENSED PRODUCTS for use solely in one or more GAVI Countries; provided, however, that sales and distribution of LICENSED PRODUCTS shall not be deemed made for Humanitarian Purposes unless products are distributed at locally-affordable prices.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.45PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN-LEFT: 43.6PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF">
	1.3
</FONT>
<FONT ID="TRGRRTFTOHTMLTAB" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 5.4PT">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	NON-GAVI COUNTRY
</FONT>
	shall mean any country that is not a GAVI Country.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.3PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 12PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.3PT">
<TABLE ID="E89FEE8B4D084C568C47963D6C649535" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 43.85PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 32.15PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	1.4
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	QUALIFIED HUMANITARIAN ORGANIZATION
</FONT>
	shall mean any governmentalagency, non-governmental agency or other not-for-profit organization that has as one of its bona fide missions to address the public health needs of underserved populations on a not-for-profit basis. For clarity, Qualified Humanitarian Organizations do not include non-governmental agencies and non- for-profit organizations that are funded or established for the benefit of any for- profit entity.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.5PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN-LEFT: 7.35PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.1PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF">
	2.
</FONT>
<FONT ID="TRGRRTFTOHTMLTAB" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 5.61PT">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Retained Rights.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.95PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.35PT">
<TABLE ID="9DD929068E374E80BDAE0BD06F71C842" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 41.65PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 34.35PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	2.1
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	HUMANITARIAN PURPOSES.
</FONT>
	Subject to the prior written approval of LICENSEE, in its good faith sole discretion, JHU may license the TECHNOLOGY,including LICENSED PATENT(S), to a QUALIFIED HUMANITARIAN ORGANIZATION for HUMANITARIAN PURPOSES, provided that any such license shall be non-exclusive and shall expressly prohibit the distribution or use of any LICENSED PRODUCT or LICENSED SERVICE in any NON GA VI country. Prior to negotiating such license, JHU will notify LICENSEE, who shall have the first right to directly negotiate a license with such organization if LICENSEE chooses.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGEBREAKAREA" STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10PT; CLEAR: BOTH; MARGIN-TOP: 10PT">
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGENUMBERAREA" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 8PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	32
</DIV>
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGEBREAK" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: ALWAYS">
<HR STYLE="BORDER-LEFT-WIDTH: 0PX; HEIGHT: 2PX; BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: 0PX; BORDER-BOTTOM-WIDTH: 0PX; COLOR: #000000; CLEAR: BOTH; MARGIN: 4PX 0PX; BORDER-TOP-WIDTH: 0PX; WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000" NOSHADE="NOSHADE">
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage143"></A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 15.75PT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN-LEFT: 8.05PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF">
	3.
</FONT>
<FONT ID="TRGRRTFTOHTMLTAB" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 5.83PT">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Sublicensing.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.85PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.35PT">
<TABLE ID="2A551CC53C3C436681E32A2025FBF646" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 43.05PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 33.95PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	3.1
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	Without obligation, the Parties will endeavor to cooperate such that essential medicines which may be developed under this License can be made available in economically disadvantaged nations. If LICENSEE chooses to provide LICENSED PRODUCTS or LICENSED SERVICES in a GAVI COUNTRY, JHU agrees to consider reasonable requests of LICENSEE for a commensurate reduction of royalty and sublicensing fees in circumstances&#160; where LICENSEE demonstrates to the satisfaction of JHU that LICENSED PRODUCTS or LICENSED SERVICES are or will be made available in such nations at reduced cost.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGEBREAKAREA" STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10PT; CLEAR: BOTH; MARGIN-TOP: 10PT">
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGENUMBERAREA" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 8PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	33
</DIV>
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGEBREAK" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: ALWAYS">
<HR STYLE="BORDER-LEFT-WIDTH: 0PX; HEIGHT: 2PX; BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: 0PX; BORDER-BOTTOM-WIDTH: 0PX; COLOR: #000000; CLEAR: BOTH; MARGIN: 4PX 0PX; BORDER-TOP-WIDTH: 0PX; WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000" NOSHADE="NOSHADE">
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage144"></A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 15.75PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 15.75PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; MARGIN-LEFT: 217.35PT; MARGIN-TOP: 1.55PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 26.7PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 177.1PT; TEXT-INDENT: 1PT">
	Exhibit E
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; MARGIN-LEFT: 217.35PT; MARGIN-TOP: 1.55PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 26.7PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 177.1PT; TEXT-INDENT: 1PT">
	KNOW-HOW
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.15PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 5.5PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 5.5PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 10PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 10PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 10PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 10PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN-LEFT: 9.5PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
	KNOW-HOW consists of two broad but diverse areas:
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN-LEFT: 8.75PT; MARGIN-TOP: 1PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.9PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 1.25PT; TEXT-INDENT: 35.3PT">
	(a)
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	the efficient synthesis of [
</FONT>
<SUP STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TEXT-TOP; LINE-HEIGHT: 1; FONT-SIZE: SMALLER;">
	18
</SUP>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	F]DCFPyL.
</FONT>
	Johns Hopkins will provide knowledge with respect to generation of the precursor and other intermediates to the final, radiolabeled adduct. They will also provide advice on alternative routes to precursor and other intermediates that have been attempted or are theoretical, as needed. That will include, for example, adaptation of the synthesis to an automated system as might be used for a commercial product. Johns Hopkins will share synthetic details sufficient to produce the Chemistry Manufacturing and Controls portion of an IND application.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.55PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 34.15PT; TEXT-INDENT: 18PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 1PX; LETTER-SPACING: 9PT">
	&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
	(b)
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	clinical implementation with a view to completion of a phase II trial.
</FONT>
	Johns Hopkins will share clinical expertise and protocols detailing a recommended path forward to test [
<SUP STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TEXT-TOP; LINE-HEIGHT: 1; FONT-SIZE: SMALLER;">
	18
</SUP>
	F]DCFPyL in patients with prostate cancer. Protocols involve recommendations for whichsites to involve for enrollment, overall study design, determining inclusion and exclusion criteria for subjects to enroll, methods by which to assess disease status, for example, response vs. progression, safety and PET imaging technique. Johns Hopkins will also provide advice regarding interpretation of or added depth to published materials related to the development of [
<SUP STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TEXT-TOP; LINE-HEIGHT: 1; FONT-SIZE: SMALLER;">
	18
</SUP>
	F]DCFPyL for human administration.
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 105.4PT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 105.4PT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 105.4PT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 105.4PT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
</DIV>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGENUMBERAREA" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 8PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	34
</DIV>
</EFX_EXHIBIT_10>

	&#160;

<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
	April 27, 2015
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">

</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">

</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
	Re:&#160; Offer of Employment
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
	Dear Sheldon:
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
	This letter is to confirm our offer to you for the position of Executive Vice President and General Counsel reporting to Mark Baker, CEO with Progenics Pharmaceuticals, Inc. This position includes the following compensation and benefits package:
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF">
<U>
	Salary
</U>
</FONT>
	: $15,625.00 semi-monthly ($375,000 per year). Payday is the 15
<SUP STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TEXT-TOP; LINE-HEIGHT: 1; FONT-SIZE: SMALLER;">
	th
</SUP>
	and the last day of each month.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF">
<U>
	Equity Participation
</U>
</FONT>
	:&#160; You may be granted an option to purchase 125,000 shares of Progenics' Common Stock.&#160; This grant is subject to approval by the Compensation Committee of the Company's Board of Directors at its next meeting.&#160; The exercise price of the option will be the closing price per share of Progenics' Common Stock on the day the option is granted.&#160; The option will expire ten years from the date of grant and will be subject to the terms of the Company's Stock Incentive Plan.&#160; You will receive an option agreement setting forth the specific terms of your option grant.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF">
<U>
	Annual Bonus Plan
</U>
</FONT>
	: You will be eligible to participate in the Company Bonus Plan. Bonuses are based on Corporate and Individual Goal achievement. Your annual target bonus is 40%.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF">
<U>
	Benefits
</U>
</FONT>
	:&#160; Participation in Progenics' Medical, Dental, Vision, 401(k), and other benefit plans that are available for all professional employees.&#160; The Company currently matches 50% of employee's 401(k) contributions between 1% and 10% of compensation.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
	You will accrue 20 days of Paid Time Off (PTO) per year, prorated your first year from your start date.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF">
<U>
	Tuition Reimbursement
</U>
</FONT>
	:&#160; Reimbursement for tuition for all pre-approved course work at accredited institutions as described in the Company's Employee Resource Guide.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF">
<U>
	Performance &amp; Salary Reviews
</U>
</FONT>
	: Your performance will be assessed under our normal performance management cycle. You will receive a performance and salary review at the end of each calendar year beginning 2015.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF">
<U>
	Immigration Law
</U>
</FONT>
	:&#160; The Immigration Reform and Control Act of 1986 (IRCA) requires that Progenics, like all employers, verify the employment authorization of every employee hired in order to determine if the individual is
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF">
<U>
	legally authorized to work in the United States
</U>
</FONT>
	.&#160; The verification process requires that all new employees complete and sign an Employment Eligibility Verification Form (Form I-9) certifying United States citizenship or authorization to work in the United States.&#160; It also requires that employers examine specific documents that the employee must provide within two days of starting work or within twenty days if proof is presented that request has been made to the appropriate agency for the necessary documents.
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGEBREAKAREA" STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10PT; CLEAR: BOTH; MARGIN-TOP: 10PT">
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGEFOOTER">

<A NAME="eolPage147"></A>
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGEHEADER" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 9.1PT; TEXT-INDENT: 9PT">
	&#160;
</DIV>

<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
<U>
	EMPLOYEE INVENTION ASSIGNMENT AND CONFIDENTIALITY AGREEMENT
</U>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; FONT: 10PT/12.55PT 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF">
	Name:&#160; Sheldon Hirt
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; FONT: 10PT/12.55PT 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF">
	Employment Date:&#160; On or before July 6, 2015
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT: 10PT/12.55PT 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT: 10PT/12.55PT 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT">
	In consideration of my employment, continued employment and the salary/wages paid to me by Progenics Pharmaceuticals, Inc. or any of its parent, subsidiary or affiliate companies (all hereafter collectively called "
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-VARIANT: NORMAL; FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL; FONT-STYLE: NORMAL">
<U>
	P
</U>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-VARIANT: NORMAL; FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL; FONT-STYLE: NORMAL">
<U>
	rogenics
</U>
</FONT>
	") and other good and valuable consideration, I understand and agree to the following provisions for the protection of Progenics' property rights and for the protection of the rights of others who have entrusted Progenics with confidential proprietary information:
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT: 10PT/12.55PT 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT: 10PT/12.55PT 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT">
	1.&#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-VARIANT: NORMAL; FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL; FONT-STYLE: NORMAL">
<U>
	Disclosure to Progenics
</U>
</FONT>
	.&#160; I agree to disclose fully and promptly to Progenics all proprietary rights (the expression "proprietary rights" means all intellectual and physical work product having actual or potential value to Progenics including inventions, whether or not patentable and whether or not tested or reduced to practice, discoveries, ideas, conceptions, developments, designs, works of authorship, trade secrets, know-how and tangible expressions, whether or not copyrightable, and whether or not relating to human pharmaceutical research and development, molecular biology, virology, immunology, biochemistry, data processing, computer software systems, programs or procedures) developed, conceived, reduced to practice or learned by me solely or jointly with others, at any time during the term of my employment and for a period of two years thereafter, and which proprietary rights&#160; relate to the actual or anticipated business activities of Progenics,&#160; result from, or are suggested by, work which I do for Progenics,&#160; are funded in whole or in part by Progenics, or&#160; result from any use of premises, equipment or property (tangible or intangible) owned, leased, licensed or contracted for by Progenics.&#160; I agree to make and maintain written records of the aforesaid proprietary rights and to submit promptly the same, and supplemental oral disclosure, to my superiors at Progenics.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT: 10PT/12.55PT 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT: 10PT/12.55PT 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT">
	2.&#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-VARIANT: NORMAL; FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL; FONT-STYLE: NORMAL">
<U>
	Ownership of Proprietary Rights
</U>
</FONT>
	.&#160; I acknowledge and agree that Progenics shall own, and I agree to assign and hereby do assign to Progenics, the entire right, title and interest in and to all proprietary rights embraced by Paragraph 1 above.&#160; I further agree to execute all papers, and otherwise to provide all requested assistance, at Progenics' expense, during and subsequent to my employment, to enable Progenics or its nominees to perfect and enforce its proprietary rights including, without limitation, obtaining such patents, copyrights and other legal protection as it may desire, in any country.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT: 10PT/12.55PT 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT: 10PT/12.55PT 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT">
	3.&#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-VARIANT: NORMAL; FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL; FONT-STYLE: NORMAL">
<U>
	Confidentiality
</U>
</FONT>
	.&#160; I agree to preserve in confidence and not to use, to publish, or to otherwise disclose to, either during or subsequent to my employment, without the prior written permission of Progenics, all confidential proprietary rights or any knowledge, information or materials about the products, services, know-how, research and development, customers, business plans of Progenics or any confidential information about financial matters, marketing, pricing, compensation or any other confidential information of Progenics, its customers, or others from whom Progenics has received information under obligations of confidence (collectively, "
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-VARIANT: NORMAL; FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL; FONT-STYLE: NORMAL">
<U>
	Confidential Information
</U>
</FONT>
	").
</DIV>

<DIV ID="DSPFPAGEFOOTER">

	&#160;

<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
	Notwithstanding the foregoing paragraph, any restriction on your use, publication or disclosure of Confidential Information shall not apply to any information:&#160; (a) that is in or subsequently enters the public domain through no fault of yours or any person affiliated with you in any manner; (b) that you have received or subsequently receive from a third party under no duty of confidentiality to Progenics; and (c) solely with respect to disclosure of such information, that you are required to disclose pursuant to an order of a court of competent jurisdiction or another government agency having appropriate authority, provided that in such event you promptly notify Progenies of such requirement, and cooperate in all respects with Progenies in any effort to contest or limit the scope of the disclosure.&#160; The provisions of the foregoing clause (c) shall apply only for the purposes of each particular order where disclosure is required.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT">
	4.&#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF">
<U>
	Termination of Employment
</U>
</FONT>
	.&#160; In the event of the termination of my employment at Progenics, whether or not such termination is voluntary, I will deliver promptly to my superior at Progenics all documents which relate to the business activities of Progenics, and all materials and things which belong to or have been entrusted by others to Progenics including, without limitation, all physical embodiments of any proprietary rights of Progenics.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT">
	5.&#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF">
<U>
	Confidential Information of Others
</U>
</FONT>
	.&#160; I agree not to disclose to Progenics, or to use in my work at Progenics any confidential information belonging to others, or any prior inventions made by me which Progenics is not entitled to learn of or use.&#160; I represent that the inventions identified in the _______&#160;&#160; pages I attach hereto constitute all of the unpatented inventions which I have made prior to my employment at Progenics, which inventions shall be excluded from this agreement.&#160; (It is only necessary to list the title of such inventions and the purpose thereof.)&#160; If there are no such unpatented inventions, employee initials here: ________.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT">
	6.&#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF">
<U>
	Prior Agreements
</U>
</FONT>
	.&#160; I represent that I have attached hereto a copy of any agreement (such as a prior employment agreement) which affects my ability to comply with the terms of this agreement.&#160; If there is no such agreement, employee initials here: ______.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT">
	7.&#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF">
<U>
	Miscellaneous.
</U>
</FONT>
	&#160; This agreement shall be binding on my executors, administrators, heirs, legal representatives or assigns, and may not be modified except in writing with the approval of an officer of Progenics.&#160; If any provision of this agreement is determined to be illegal or unenforceable, because of the duration thereof or the area or scope covered, I hereby request any court making such determination to reduce the duration, area and/or scope so that in its reduced form such covenant shall be enforceable and I agree that in such event all remaining provisions shall remain in full force and effect.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT">
	8.&#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF">
<U>
	Governing Law
</U>
</FONT>
	.&#160; The validity, interpretation and performance of this Agreement shall be governed according to the laws of the State of New York applicable to agreements made and to be performed entirely in that state, without reference to any conflict of laws rules or principles.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT">

<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF">
	Date:&#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-VARIANT: NORMAL; FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL; FONT-STYLE: NORMAL">
<U>
	May 23, 2015&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</U>
</FONT>

</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; FONT: 10PT/12.55PT 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF">
	Sheldon Hirt
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7PT">

<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7PT">
	2

	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 9.1PT; TEXT-INDENT: 9PT">

</DIV>

<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 9PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN-LEFT: 35.1PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 9.1PT">

	&#160;
</DIV>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
<U>
	EMPLOYEE NON-COMPETITION AND NON-SOLICITATION AGREEMENT
</U>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
	Name:&#160; Sheldon Hirt
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
	Employment Date:&#160; On or before July 6, 2015
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT">
	In consideration of my employment, continued employment and the salary/wages paid to me by Progenics Pharmaceuticals, Inc. or any of its parent, subsidiary or affiliate companies (all hereafter collectively called "
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF">
<U>
	Progenics
</U>
</FONT>
	") and other good and valuable consideration, I understand and agree to the following provisions for the protection of Progenics:
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT">
	1.&#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF">
<U>
	Non-Competition
</U>
</FONT>
	.&#160; In the event of the termination of my employment at Progenics, to the extent that such termination is voluntary, I will not for a period of one (1) year accept a consulting engagement or employment with a company or other entity engaged in the development, production, marketing or sale of products or services that directly compete or, upon commercialization, would directly compete with products of the Company being developed (so long as such development has not been abandoned), marketed or sold at the time of termination, without written permission from Progenics.&#160; Such permission will not be unreasonably withheld in those instances where such employment does not involve risk of use or disclosure of any Confidential Information which I may acquire during the course of my employment with Progenics.&#160; As used herein, the term "Confidential Information" refers to all confidential proprietary rights or any knowledge, information or materials about the products, services, know-how, research and development, customers, business plans of Progenics or any confidential information about financial matters, marketing, pricing, compensation or any other confidential information of Progenics, its customers, or others from whom Progenics has received information under obligations of confidence.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT">
	2.&#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF">
<U>
	Non-Solicitation
</U>
</FONT>
	.&#160; During the term of my employment and for a period of two (2) years thereafter I will not solicit or attempt to induce, directly or indirectly, any employee of Progenics to accept a consulting engagement or employment.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT">
	3.&#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF">
<U>
	Miscellaneous
</U>
</FONT>
	.&#160; This agreement shall be binding on my executors, administrators, heirs, legal representatives or assigns, and may not be modified except in writing with the approval of an officer of Progenics.&#160; If any provision of this agreement is determined to be illegal or unenforceable, because of the duration thereof or the area or scope covered, I hereby request any court making such determination to reduce the duration, area and/or scope so that in its reduced form such covenant shall be enforceable and I agree that in such event all remaining provisions shall remain in full force and effect.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT">
	4.&#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF">
<U>
	Governing Law
</U>
</FONT>
	.&#160; The validity, interpretation and performance of this Agreement shall be governed according to the laws of the State of New York applicable to agreements made and to be performed entirely in that state, without reference to any conflict of laws rules or principles.
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-VARIANT: NORMAL; FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL; FONT-STYLE: NORMAL">
<U>
	/s/&#160;Sheldon Hirt&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</U>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 5.01PT">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF">
	Date:&#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-VARIANT: NORMAL; FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL; FONT-STYLE: NORMAL">
<U>
	May 23, 2015&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;

</DIV>

</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
	Re:&#160; Offer of Employment
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
	Dear Patrick:
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
	This letter is to confirm our offer to you for the position of Senior Vice President and CFO, reporting to Mark Baker, Chief Executive Officer of Progenics Pharmaceuticals, Inc.&#160; This position includes the following compensation and benefits package:
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF">
<U>
	Starting Salary and Payday
</U>
</FONT>
	: $14,583.34 semi-monthly ($350,000 per year).&#160; Payday is the 15
<SUP STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TEXT-TOP; LINE-HEIGHT: 1; FONT-SIZE: SMALLER;">
	th
</SUP>
	and the last day of each month.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF">
<U>
	Equity Participation
</U>
</FONT>
	:&#160; You may be granted an option to purchase 125,000 shares of Progenics' Common Stock.&#160; This grant is subject to approval by the Compensation Committee of the Company's Board of Directors at its next meeting.&#160; The exercise price of the option will be the closing price per share of Progenics' Common Stock on the day the option is granted.&#160; The option will expire ten years from the date of grant and will be subject to the terms of the Company's Stock Incentive Plan.&#160; You will receive an option agreement setting forth the specific terms of your option grant.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF">
<U>
	Annual Bonus Plan:
</U>
</FONT>
	&#160; You will be eligible to participate in the Company Bonus Plan.&#160; Bonuses are based on corporate and Individual Goal achievement.&#160; Your annual target bonus is 35%.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF">
<U>
	Benefits
</U>
</FONT>
	:&#160; Participation in Progenics' Medical, Dental, Vision, 401(k), and other benefit plans that are available for all professional employees.&#160; The Company currently matches 50% of employee's 401(k) contributions between 1% and 10% of compensation.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
	You will accrue 20 days of Paid Time Off (PTO) per year, prorated your first year from your start date.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF">
<U>
	Tuition Reimbursement
</U>
</FONT>
	:&#160; Reimbursement for tuition for all pre-approved course work at accredited institutions as described in the Company's Employee Resource Guide.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF">
<U>
	Performance and Salary Reviews
</U>
</FONT>
	:&#160; Your performance will be assessed under our normal performance management cycle.&#160; You will receive a performance and salary review at the end of each calendar year.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF">
<U>
	Immigration Law
</U>
</FONT>
	:&#160; The Immigration Reform and Control Act of 1986 (IRCA) requires that Progenics, like all employers, verify the employment authorization of every employee hired in order to determine if the individual is
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF">
<U>
	legally authorized to work in the United States
</U>
</FONT>
	.&#160; The verification process requires that all new employees complete and sign an Employment Eligibility Verification Form (Form I-9) certifying United States citizenship or authorization to work in the United States.&#160; It also requires that employers examine specific documents that the employee must provide within two days of starting work or within twenty days if proof is presented that request has been made to the appropriate agency for the necessary documents.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
</DIV>
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGEBREAKAREA" STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10PT; CLEAR: BOTH; MARGIN-TOP: 10PT">
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGEFOOTER">
</DIV>
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGEBREAK" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: ALWAYS">

<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
<U>
	EMPLOYEE INVENTION ASSIGNMENT AND CONFIDENTIALITY AGREEMENT
</U>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
	Name:&#160; Patrick Fabbio
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
	Employment Date:&#160; On or before November 16, 2015
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT">
	In consideration of my employment, continued employment and the salary/wages paid to me by Progenics Pharmaceuticals, Inc. or any of its parent, subsidiary or affiliate companies (all hereafter collectively called "
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF">
<U>
	Progenics
</U>
</FONT>
	") and other good and valuable consideration, I understand and agree to the following provisions for the protection of Progenics' property rights and for the protection of the rights of others who have entrusted Progenics with confidential proprietary information:
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT">
	1.&#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF">
<U>
	Disclosure to Progenics
</U>
</FONT>
	.&#160; I agree to disclose fully and promptly to Progenics all proprietary rights (the expression "proprietary rights" means all intellectual and physical work product having actual or potential value to Progenics including inventions, whether or not patentable and whether or not tested or reduced to practice, discoveries, ideas, conceptions, developments, designs, works of authorship, trade secrets, know-how and tangible expressions, whether or not copyrightable, and whether or not relating to human pharmaceutical research and development, molecular biology, virology, immunology, biochemistry, data processing, computer software systems, programs or procedures) developed, conceived, reduced to practice or learned by me solely or jointly with others, at any time during the term of my employment and for a period of two years thereafter, and which proprietary rights&#160; relate to the actual or anticipated business activities of Progenics,&#160; result from, or are suggested by, work which I do for Progenics,&#160; are funded in whole or in part by Progenics, or&#160; result from any use of premises, equipment or property (tangible or intangible) owned, leased, licensed or contracted for by Progenics.&#160; I agree to make and maintain written records of the aforesaid proprietary rights and to submit promptly the same, and supplemental oral disclosure, to my superiors at Progenics.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT">
	2.&#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF">
<U>
	Ownership of Proprietary Rights
</U>
</FONT>
	.&#160; I acknowledge and agree that Progenics shall own, and I agree to assign and hereby do assign to Progenics, the entire right, title and interest in and to all proprietary rights embraced by Paragraph 1 above.&#160; I further agree to execute all papers, and otherwise to provide all requested assistance, at Progenics' expense, during and subsequent to my employment, to enable Progenics or its nominees to perfect and enforce its proprietary rights including, without limitation, obtaining such patents, copyrights and other legal protection as it may desire, in any country.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT">
	3.&#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF">
<U>
	Confidentiality
</U>
</FONT>
	.&#160; I agree to preserve in confidence and not to use, to publish, or to otherwise disclose to, either during or subsequent to my employment, without the prior written permission of Progenics, all confidential proprietary rights or any knowledge, information or materials about the products, services, know-how, research and development, customers, business plans of Progenics or any confidential information about financial matters, marketing, pricing, compensation or any other confidential information of Progenics, its customers, or others from whom Progenics has received information under obligations of confidence (collectively, "
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF">
<U>
	Confidential Information
</U>
</FONT>
	").
</DIV>
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGEBREAKAREA" STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10PT; CLEAR: BOTH; MARGIN-TOP: 10PT">
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGEFOOTER">
</DIV>

</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage155"></A>
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGEHEADER" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 9.1PT; TEXT-INDENT: 9PT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 9.1PT; TEXT-INDENT: 9PT">
<TABLE ID="9987462FB02546CEA27D8B087699BEB3" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>

<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
	Notwithstanding the foregoing paragraph, any restriction on your use, publication or disclosure of Confidential Information shall not apply to any information:&#160; (a) that is in or subsequently enters the public domain through no fault of yours or any person affiliated with you in any manner; (b) that you have received or subsequently receive from a third party under no duty of confidentiality to Progenics; and (c) solely with respect to disclosure of such information, that you are required to disclose pursuant to an order of a court of competent jurisdiction or another government agency having appropriate authority, provided that in such event you promptly notify Progenies of such requirement, and cooperate in all respects with Progenies in any effort to contest or limit the scope of the disclosure.&#160; The provisions of the foregoing clause (c) shall apply only for the purposes of each particular order where disclosure is required.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT">
	4.&#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF">
<U>
	Termination of Employment
</U>
</FONT>
	.&#160; In the event of the termination of my employment at Progenics, whether or not such termination is voluntary, I will deliver promptly to my superior at Progenics all documents which relate to the business activities of Progenics, and all materials and things which belong to or have been entrusted by others to Progenics including, without limitation, all physical embodiments of any proprietary rights of Progenics.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT">
	5.&#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF">
<U>
	Confidential Information of Others
</U>
</FONT>
	.&#160; I agree not to disclose to Progenics, or to use in my work at Progenics any confidential information belonging to others, or any prior inventions made by me which Progenics is not entitled to learn of or use.&#160; I represent that the inventions identified in the
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-VARIANT: NORMAL; FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL; FONT-STYLE: NORMAL">
<U>
	/s/ N/A
</U>
</FONT>
	&#160;&#160; pages I attach hereto constitute all of the unpatented inventions which I have made prior to my employment at Progenics, which inventions shall be excluded from this agreement.&#160; (It is only necessary to list the title of such inventions and the purpose thereof.)&#160; If there are no such unpatented inventions, employee initials here:&#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-VARIANT: NORMAL; FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL; FONT-STYLE: NORMAL">
<U>

</FONT>
	.

<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF">
<U>
	Miscellaneous.
</U>
</FONT>
	&#160; This agreement shall be binding on my executors, administrators, heirs, legal representatives or assigns, and may not be modified except in writing with the approval of an officer of Progenics.&#160; If any provision of this agreement is determined to be illegal or unenforceable, because of the duration thereof or the area or scope covered, I hereby request any court making such determination to reduce the duration, area and/or scope so that in its reduced form such covenant shall be enforceable and I agree that in such event all remaining provisions shall remain in full force and effect.

<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
<U>
	EMPLOYEE NON-COMPETITION AND NON-SOLICITATION AGREEMENT
</U>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
	Name:&#160; Patrick Fabbio
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
	Employment Date:&#160; On or before November 16, 2015
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT">
	In consideration of my employment, continued employment and the salary/wages paid to me by Progenics Pharmaceuticals, Inc. or any of its parent, subsidiary or affiliate companies (all hereafter collectively called "
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF">
<U>
	Progenics
</U>
</FONT>
	") and other good and valuable consideration, I understand and agree to the following provisions for the protection of Progenics:
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT">
	1.&#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF">
<U>
	Non-Competition
</U>
</FONT>
	.&#160; In the event of the termination of my employment at Progenics, to the extent that such termination is voluntary, I will not for a period of one (1) year accept a consulting engagement or employment with a company or other entity engaged in the development, production, marketing or sale of products or services that directly compete or, upon commercialization, would directly compete with products of the Company being developed (so long as such development has not been abandoned), marketed or sold at the time of termination, without written permission from Progenics.&#160; Such permission will not be unreasonably withheld in those instances where such employment does not involve risk of use or disclosure of any Confidential Information which I may acquire during the course of my employment with Progenics.&#160; As used herein, the term "Confidential Information" refers to all confidential proprietary rights or any knowledge, information or materials about the products, services, know-how, research and development, customers, business plans of Progenics or any confidential information about financial matters, marketing, pricing, compensation or any other confidential information of Progenics, its customers, or others from whom Progenics has received information under obligations of confidence.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT">
	2.&#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF">
<U>
	Non-Solicitation
</U>
</FONT>
	.&#160; During the term of my employment and for a period of two (2) years thereafter I will not solicit or attempt to induce, directly or indirectly, any employee of Progenics to accept a consulting engagement or employment.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT">
	3.&#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF">
<U>
	Miscellaneous
</U>
</FONT>
	.&#160; This agreement shall be binding on my executors, administrators, heirs, legal representatives or assigns, and may not be modified except in writing with the approval of an officer of Progenics.&#160; If any provision of this agreement is determined to be illegal or unenforceable, because of the duration thereof or the area or scope covered, I hereby request any court making such determination to reduce the duration, area and/or scope so that in its reduced form such covenant shall be enforceable and I agree that in such event all remaining provisions shall remain in full force and effect.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT">
	4.&#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF">
<U>
	Governing Law
</U>
</FONT>
	.&#160; The validity, interpretation and performance of this Agreement shall be governed according to the laws of the State of New York applicable to agreements made and to be performed entirely in that state, without reference to any conflict of laws rules or principles.
</DIV>
